GSP29vytrkt1u:1264: sāmagrī tadbrahmatvaṃ stavatastvamityuktaṃ syāt“iti granthakṛduktyeva siddhasādhanāditoṣeṇa nirastaṃ bhavati /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1282: viṣayoparaktajñānagrāhakeṇa prameti padajanyajñānenoktarūpeṇa pramāṇyagrahaṇātsiddhasādhanavāraṇāya -- yāvaditi viśeṣaṇam /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1293: tathāpyekayaiva śaktyā prakaraṇaprāptaghaṭajñānaparāmarśakena tatpadena janitajñānasya prāmāṇyāviṣayakatvena bādhatadavasthyāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:1295: asmiṃśca pakṣe saṃbhavamātraṃ sādhyaṃ na tu niyamaḥ /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1332: granthakartuḥ kuto niyamo nābhimata ityata āha -- svatastveti //

GSP29vytrkt1u:1350: evaṃ rūpe svatastve tvāṃ pratyucyamāne grāhyaprāmāṇyāśrayaviṣayaṃ 3 yadīśvarajñānaṃ tadajanyaṃ tadeva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:1351: tadviṣayatvena tvayā siddhasādhanatāyā vaktuṃ śakyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/

GSP29vytrkt1u:1364: paratastvapakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyasyaivaṃ vidhaṃ sāmānyaprattyāsattijanyaṃ prameyamiti yajjñānaṃ dadviṣayatvena siddhasādhanāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:1365: viṣayapadenaprakāratvavivakṣāyāmapi svatastvapakṣepi prāmāṇyasya sarvaṃ jñānaṃ guṇa
GSP29vytrkt1u:1378: nanu prameyamitijñāne viśeṣyatayā prāmāṇya 3 sya viṣayatvepi na prakāratayā /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1386: tadajanyajñānaprakāratvaṃ neti sarvaṃ jñānaṃ guṇa iti jñānaniṣṭha prāmāṇyāṃśe bādha ityarthaḥ ;
GSP29vytrkt1u:1395: na tu janyapadadvayaṃ vā samānādhikaraṇapadadvayaṃ vā prakṣepyam /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1459: 12 śvarajñānānyādāya 13 siddhasādhanatvābhāve 'pi jñānaṃ guṇa ityādi 14 jñānajñānaprāmāṇyānuvyavasāyasya

GSP29vytrkt1u:1477: tatra kiṃ pramāṇamityata āha -- svatastve pramāṇaṃ tviti /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1498: cakṣurādirūpānupramāṇavyāvṛttasya sākṣājjñeyaviṣayīkāritvasya lābhāya jñāneti viśeṣaṇaṃ tattajjñānapadam /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1702: syāt / sukhasākṣātkārasya tatsākṣātkā 2 rābhilāpasya ca madhyepi tatkalyyaṃ syāt prāmāṇyānumiti prāmāṇyābhilāparyormadhye 'pi jñānāntaraṃ kalpyaṃ syāditi na tṛtīyaheturasiddhaḥ /

GSP29vytrkt1u:1721: manmate kevalānupramāṇasādhāraṇasya 1 yāthārthyarūpaprāmāṇyaviṣayakatvasya sādhyatvāt kevalapramāṇāsādhāraṇasyollekhasya hetutvācca // @--------------------------------------------------------------------------

GSP29vytrkt1u:2140: 1. rajatatve -ca. mu. 2. he- ca. cha. ka.ga.mu. 3.teḥ - ca.
GSP29vytrkt1u:2147: na ca vyavasāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaviṣayakatvamagṛhṇan dharmyaṃśādiviṣayakatvamātraṃ gṛhṇannanyo 'nuvyavasāyo 'nubhūyate /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2153: kiṃ tvidaṃ rajatatvena jānāmītī“tyādimaṇyuktamāha -- idaṃ rajatatveneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2158: anu 2 vyavasāyādanyato vyavahārādiliṅgato vyavasāya 3 prāmāṇyānumitito vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2160: nanu tadaṃśe 'nuvyavasāyāntarataḥ siddhiranubhavasiddhetyato nirāha -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2167: viśeṣyāniṣṭho rajatatvādiniṣṭho jñānena saha svarūpasaṃbandhaviśeṣo vā prakāratvamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2174: jñānena saha svarūpasambandhaviśeṣo na bahirartha ityata āha-- kḷptasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2176: viśeṣaṇajñānahetutvapakṣe ca dvitīyasyāyogena tatra bhāsamānetyādirūpasyaiva prakāratvasya kḷptatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2177: “vaiśiṣṭyaviṣayakatvasyāpi bhāne 'nubhavasiddhe“iti prāguktasiddhamityata āha -- idaṃ rajatatve 3 ti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2182: prāganupasthitasyāpi vaiśiṣṭyasya vyavasāye rajatatvasyeva prakāratayā bhāne bādhakābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2187: rajatārthi 1 pravṛttiṃ ca prati hetutvasya ca sambhave tasya vaiśiṣṭyaviṣayakatvābhāvāpātācca /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2188: anuvyavasāya eva tṛtīyārthollekhastu tatra vaiśiṣṭyabhāne 'pyadhikasya rajatatve vyavasāyaṃ prati prakāratvasyāpi bhānāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2191: evaṃrūpānuvyavasāye vipratipattiriti ce 2 ttarhīdaṃ rajatatvena jānāmītyākāropi vaiśiṣṭyābhāne 3 pyupadyatā 4 mityatiprasaṅga ityāha -- vvavasāyasyeti
GSP29vytrkt1u:2193: vaiśiṣṭyasya tṛtīyārthatve vyavasāyepi tṛtīyārthollikhāpatteriti prāguktadoṣaṃ nirāha -- anuvyavasāya eveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2197: vaiśiṣṭyasyāpi bhāne vyavasāyasamānākāratā syādityata āha -- ata eveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2201: “bahirviśeṣyake manasosāmarthyā“diti maṇau viśeṣyapadaprayogasūcitaṃ“na ca tanmātraṃ prāmāṇyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2206: nanvanuvyavasāye vaiśiṣṭyasya vyavasāyagatasya rajatatvavadviśiṣayakatvasya ca bhānepi prāmāṇyāntargataṃ vyavasāyaniṣṭhaṃ rajatatvavadviśeṣyakatvaṃ na bhāsate /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2207: na ca rajatatvavadviṣayakatve sati rajatatvaprakārakatvameva prāmāṇyam manmate bhramasādhāraṇyāditi cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2209: viśeṣyakatvasyā 1 nuvyavasāyena gṛhītatayā samānasaṃvitsaṃvedyatayā ca vyavasāyeta
GSP29vytrkt1u:2212: kiṃ nāma rajatatvavadviśeṣyakaṃ rajatatvaprakārakamidaṃ jñānaṃ“ityādipakṣadharoktaṃ hṛdi kutvāśaṅkate - nanviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2219: tanmate śuktau rajatatvādyārore sati tadāśrayasya eva śaktā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2220: na tu viśeṣyatva iti vādinaṃ pratyāha--samāneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2241: nanvarthasatvaghaṭitasyaiva prāmāṇyarūpatvāttasyānuvyavasāyavedyatā na prapteti bhāvena śaṅkate --nanviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2243: sākṣiṇā śrutaṃ tenoccaritaṃ vākyaṃ sākṣivākyaṃ tasyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2250: gehe ghaṭamicchāmi gehe ghaṭasaṃśayaḥ gehe ghaṭajñānamityādivākyajanyajñānenāpi ghaṭasatvasidhyāpātāditi cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2251: yatra jñānasyā 1 nyadvāreṇārthaviṣayatayā tatra dvāriṇā dvāraṃ satvenārthaviṣayakamiti grahaṇe dvāriṇopi satvenārthaviṣayateti dṛṣṭānusāreṇa kalpane 'natiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2252: na hi dvāramicchādikaṃ satvenārthaviṣayatayā dvāriṇā jñānena gṛhītam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2254: gehe ghaṭajñānaṃ sākṣiṇā śruta 2 vākyaṃ ca yadisatvenārthaviṣayatayā dvāriṇā 3 jñānena gṛhītaṃ tadā tenāpi ghaṭasatvaṃ sidhyatyeva / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2255: anyaviṣayatayā vaiśiṣṭyagrahaṇe 4 pi tatsatvādhāraṇarūpatvamanuvyavasāyasyāviruddhamiti 5 vaktuṃ sāmānyanyāyaṃ ca 6 vadannatiprasaṅgaṃ nirāha -- yatreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2259: tarhi pūrvoktasthalepyevaṃ syādityata āha -- geha iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2261: etenānuvyavasāyaḥ sattayārthaviṣayakaḥ satvenārthaviṣayatayā vyavasāyaviṣakatvāt tādṛśaṃ yadgehe ghaṭajñānamiti jñānaṃ śrutaṃ sākṣivākyaṃ ca tadvat /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2262: gehe ghaṭasaṃśaya ityādijñāne 7 tu hetorevābhāvānna vyabhicāra ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2267: yadi ca savyavadhānatvamātreṇa satvāniścāyakatvaṃ tarhi gehe mama ghaṭaprametyāpta 1 vākyajanyajñānenāpi ghaṭasatvaṃ na sidhyet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2268: nanu tatrārthatathātvaghaṭitaṃ prāmātvaṃ gṛhṇajjñānaṃ ghaṭasatvaṃ svātantryeṇāpi gṛhṇātīti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2275: parantu tadvatvasya tadayayogyatayā cākṣuṣajñāne saurabhasyevopanītasya bhānam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2279: etena yatkaiściduktaṃ ghaṭajñānavānahaṃ ayaṃ ghaṭa ityatra vailakṣaṇyasya sarvasaṃmatayā tanniyāmakasyopanāyakabhānasāmagrīsamavadhāna tadasamavadhānādepavaśyakalpanāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:2296: gehe ghaṭaprametyādiśabdasthale pramātvena jñānamānasyāpi svātantryeṇopanāyakattvāṅgīkāreṇa vyabhicārācca /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2299: tadabhāva eva svātantryamiti ghaṭapramāvānahamityādau tathā bhānepi ghaṭajñānavānahamityādau na svātantryeṇa bhānam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2308: trayotaśe gītāyāṃ kṣetrakṣetrajñasvarūpaṃ ṛṣibhirbahudhā gītamityanāśaṅkitadoṣa ṛṣigānachandorūpadvāreṇārthagrāhakasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:2318: korthaḥ kiṃ sādhāraṇadharmajñānaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vā viśeṣadarśanamastīti ? nādyaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2320: antye dharmitvasya sadekaniṣṭhatvena viśeṣatvepi tasya satvāniścaye kathaṃ saṃśayavirodhitā / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2321: yadvā svātantryābhāver'thasatva niścayarūpataiva na yuktetyata āha --evaṃsatīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2328: purataḥ sanneva dharmī natvasanniti dharmiṇaḥ satvāvyabhicārānna tatra saṃdeho na tu tadaṃśe prāmāṇyaniścayatvasatvenetyarthaḥ-- sadasaditi
GSP29vytrkt1u:2331: tathāca taddharśanamātraṃ na viśeṣadarśanaṃ kiṃ tu tadvaiśiṣṭyasatvadarśanameveti tasya ca tatrābhāve kathaṃ tatra na saṃśayaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ -- tasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2333: tathā ca dharmitvarūpedantvavaiśiṣṭyāṃśe 'nuvyavasāyasya tatsattāniścayatvarūpaprāmāṇyaniścayatvābhāve dharmyaṃśeti saṃśayaḥ syādeveti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt1u:2338: apicaivaṃ tvadīye ayaṃ vahnyanubhavaḥ pramānāpramā vā dāha 1 samarthaviśeṣyakatve sati @---------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2343: tataśca dharmisaṃdeha iti bhāvenāyaṃ grantho yojyaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2347: nisyedānīṃ“nanu vahnijñānasya dāhasamarthaviṣayatvaṃ na dāhasamarthoyamiti vyavasāyagrāhya“mityādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:2356: “prathamamaprāmāṇyābhāva eva prāmāṇyaṃ vyatirekiṇā sādhyam“iti maṇikudukterāha--nāpramā veti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2360: vahnitvaprakāraka 1 niścayatvāt vyatirekeṇāpramāvaditi prāmāṇyānumāne dāhasāmarthyavadviśeṣyakatve satīti viśeṣaṇasya kena siddhiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2365: nanu smutyupanīte vyavasāye smutyupanītaṃ yaddāhasāmarthyaṃ tadvadviśeṣyakatvaṃ manasā paricchidyate / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2370: dharmadharmivaiśiṣṭyānāṃ vyavāsāyaviṣayatvena dharme vaiśiṣṭye cāvidyamāno dharmimātraniṣṭho viṣayatva viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2372: dāhasāmarthyavaiśiṣṭyagrahaṇa eva vā vaiśiṣṭyagrahaṇaśaktāvapi svātantryeṇa tadgrahaṇe vāsāmarthyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2374: tadvadviśeṣyakatvaṃ vanhirityanubhāvo dāhasāmarthyavadviśeṣyako mama vṛtta iti mānasā
GSP29vytrkt1u:2376: 1. niścayapadaṃ nāsti - ka ga. 2. tāviśeṣasya - kuṃ cha ka. 3. ka - mu.
GSP29vytrkt1u:2380: nacaivaṃ smṛtyupanīte vyavasāye smṛtyupanītaṃ yadrajatatvaṃ tadvadviśeṣyakatvamapi manasā paricchidyatām ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:2381: tathā ca prāmāṇyasya svatastvaṃ syāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2388: idaṃ rajatamiti vyavasāyaviṣayakānuvyavāsāyasya ca tādṛśajñānasāpekṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2401: anumitau prāmāṇyaniyatasya dhūmavati vahnimatvajñānasyānuvyavasāyena gṛhītatvānna tatrāpāmāṇyaśaṅketi vadatā tvayā
GSP29vytrkt1u:2412: nanūpanītaṃ tadvatvaṃ upanītavṛttitvena gṛhyata iti kalpyata ityato 'yamapi niyamo netyāha--anumitāviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2413: anumitau kadāpi prāmāṇyasaṃdehābhāvena tatra prāmāṇyaṃ svata iti prācīnamataṃ dṛṣayatā
GSP29vytrkt1u:2414: sarvatra paratastvavādinā maṇikṛdānumitau prāmāṇyaśaṅkābhāvo na prāmāṇyaniścayanibandhano
GSP29vytrkt1u:2423: na ca dāhasāmarthye saṃskāra eva pratyāsattiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2424: sa ca nirviṣayaka iti na tadviṣayatayā bhanam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2425: iha tu pratyāsattī 1 bhūto vyavasāyaḥ saviṣayaka iti vaiṣamyamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2427: nanu mānasajñānasya dahasamartha eva mama vahnatvaprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ vṛttimityākāratvena tatra dāhasāmarthyaṃ vahnaniṣṭhameva bhāti / @--------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2433: dāhasamarthoyamiti prācīnavyavasāyajanyasaṃskāra eva na tu tajjanyasmṛtirityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2434: yadyapi smṛteḥ pratyāsattitvepi tasyāḥ surabhicandanamityādau saurabhādijñānasyeva tāṭasthyenaiva tathātvannaitaccodyāvakāśaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2436: bhānamiti // pañcamānuvyavasāye dāhasāmarthyavatvasya saṃskāraviṣayatayā na bhānamityarthaḥ-- ihatviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2439: ata eva tvayapa“pragbhavīyasaṃskārātsmṛtaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ vanhijñānādau sādhyamāna“mityādyuktam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2446: anuvyavasāyasya tu purovṛttiviśeṣyakaṃ rajatatvavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhijñānaṃ vṛttamityākāratvena jñānaviṣayatvenaiva vaiśiṣṭyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2448: tatrāpi dāhasamartha eveti viṣayasaptamyātītavyavasāyaviṣayatvenaiva dāhasāmarthyasya bhānāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2449: atrāpi sukha 2 jñānasya doṣaśaṅkādirahitastambhādijñānasya ca prāthamika evānuvyavasāye
GSP29vytrkt1u:2450: mama sukha eva sukhatvena jñānaṃ vṛttaṃ stambha eva stambhatvena jñānaṃ vṛttamityākāradarśanācca /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2451: nanu tathāpi 3 tatra yasya vyavasāyasya viṣayatayā dāhasāmarthyaṃ bhāti sa na pratyāsattiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2453: etaccopalakṣaṇaṃ yadasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamāsādya manobahirgaucarāṃ pramāṃ janayati tanmānāntaramiti vyāpteḥ saṃskārasya mānāntaratvāpatteścetyapi dhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2454: smṛteḥ pratyāsattitvepyaviśeṣāditi heturasiddha iti bhāvena śaṅkate -- nanviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2469: sākṣī dharmyaṃśa iva vaiśiṣṭyāṃśepi sattāniścayarūpo na cedasya vyavasāyasyedaṃ vaiśiṣṭya viṣaya ityādilokasiddhavyavasthityayogādityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:2474: nanu tathāpi svatastve 'nabhyāsadaśāyāṃ saṃśayo na syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2481: yathā hi tvanmate jātivyaktyorekavittivādyatvaniyamepi doṣavaśādidaṃ rūpyamitibhrama
GSP29vytrkt1u:2483: saṃśayasthale jñānagrahe satyapi tena tatpāmāṇyāgrahepi na svatastvabhaṅgaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2488: asati pratibandhesākṣivedyatvaniyamo vā sākṣivedyatvayogyatā vā svatastvamityu 2 ktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2491: evaṃ ca jñānaṃ gṛhṇatā sākṣiṇā śaktipratibandhātprāmāṇyāgrahaṇepyasmaduktasvatastvāhānyā svatastvapakṣepi dharmijñānasya prāmāṇyaniścayasya ca saṃbhavena saṃśayo yukta eva / @--------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2493: sākṣiṇi pratibaddhe prāmāṇyaviṣaye manasi saṃśayopapatteḥ“iti tatvanirṇayaṭīkāṃ vivṛṇvānaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:2496: atra sarvatra sākṣī pāguktarūpa 4 eva jñeyaḥ--grahaṇeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2499: astu sāmagrī tataḥ kimityata āha--evaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2501: vyavasāyarūpasya saṃśaye dharmiṇo yajjñānaṃ tasyetyarthaḥ -- saṃśayo yukta eveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2509: na tva prāmāṇyagrahaṇaśakta 2 rivāhitetyetāvataiva prāmāṇyasya svatastvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2510: dṛśyate ca vahnau dahaprakāśanaśaktyoḥ sajatvepi pratibandhakabhedaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2513: asati pratibandhake jñānagocarasākṣivedyatvanaiyatyamityasya pratibandhe sati sākṣiṇā jñānaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ cobhayaṃ na gṛhyata iti yadyarthastadā paraṃ svatastvahāniḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2525: 1. yoreka - kha. 2. ritye- kuṃ cha ka-ga. 3.yadvā -kuṃ 4. ra -kuṃ. 5. ra -kuṃ.
GSP29vytrkt1u:2529: enaṃ mā dahetyādau dāhaśakteriva viṣayabhedena pratibandhāpratibandhau yuktau /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2539: nanu tatra“na prakṛte kācidasmākaṃ hāniḥ“iti hi pāṭhaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2542: hi dāhābhāva eva vetrabījaṃ vetrāṅkuraṃ janayatītyetāvatā dāhābhāvo vetrāṅkurasya kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2543: kiṃ tu tato viparītakāryānutpāde sati vetrabījaṃ svamāhimnaivāṅkuraṃ karoti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2544: anyathotsargāpavādau kvāpi na syātāṃ“iti pūrvavākyaṃ hṛdi kutvāha -- pratibandhaketi / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2547: yatra pūrvaṃ doṣaśaṅkāderabhāvepi kāraṇāntaropanipātātpaścāttatsaṃśayastatra pūrvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścīyata eva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2549: evaṃ pratibandhakena prāmāṇyaniścamupetya saṃśayamupapādya kvacit prāmāṇyaniścayamupetyāpi saṃśayamupapādayati-- yatreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2553: yajjñānaṃ yatra pratabandhakaṃ tatsāmagryapi tatra pratibandhaketyasyābhāvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2558: sudṛḍho nirṇayo yatra jñeyaṃ tatsākṣidarśanaṃ iti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2559: mānase darśane doṣā naiva syuḥ sākṣidarśane //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2562: etena yaduktaṃ maṇau“niścitepi prāmāṇye doṣāntarāttatra saṃśayaḥ iti cenna //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2566: etena prāmāṇyaniścaye jāgrati kathaṃ sandeha iti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2569: yattu“na ca prāmāṇyasaṃśayādviṣayasaṃśayavatprāmāṇyajñāne prāmāṇyasaṃśayāt prāmāṇya saṃśaya iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2571: svataḥ prāmāṇyagrahe saṃśayānupapatteḥ“iti maṇivacanaṃ tadapyatenaiva nirastaṃ bodhyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2578: evaṃ vāstavaṃ mūlagranthādyuktaṃ saṃśayopapādānaṃ pradarśyādhunā yaduktaṃ maṇau“dharmijñānaṃ ca saṃśayahetuḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2580: koṭyuktaṭatvaṃ ca na syāt“iti granthena dharmijñānābhāvena saṃśayābhāvopapādanadūṣaṇaṃ tadapi neti bhāvena prauḍhyā samādhidvayamanyāpadeśenāha -- kecitvityādinā ahetutvāditi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2581: viśeṣyendriyasannikarṣakoṭismṛtirūpaviśaṣaṇajñānatadubhayāsaṃsargāgrahādiviśiṣṭajñāna sāmānyasāmagrīta eva tadutpattau tadatiriktā saṃśaye dharmijñānārūpā viśeṣasāmagrī na kalpyā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2582: tathāca saṃśayasthale dharmiṇo vyavasāyasyaivājñānena prāmāṇyaniścopapatyā svatastvāhīniḥ prāmāṇyādisaṃśayaśca yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2583: nanu turagādauvegena gacchataḥ puṃso 'nekavṛkṣendriyasannikarṣepi kvacideva panasatvādisaṃdeho
GSP29vytrkt1u:2584: na sarvatretyevaṃvidho dharminiyama eva saṃśaye dharmijñānahetutāṃ vyavasthāpayatītyata
GSP29vytrkt1u:2587: tvayāpi hi sarvatra sannikarṣe 'viśiṣṭepi kvacideva dharmijñānaṃ nānyatretyatra viṣayamāhātmyādikaṃ niyāmakaṃ vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2589: taddhetorevāstu hetutvaṃ madhye kiṃ teneti nyāyāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2600: nanu dharmijñānasyāhetutve saṃśaye koṭyuktaṭatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2603: vā koṭyaktatvasya vācyatayā tādṛśasya dharmijñānāhetutve 'nupapatterityata āha --
GSP29vytrkt1u:2607: nanu sādhāraṇadharmadarśanasya saṃśayahetutvāddharmajñānārthaṃ dharmijñānamāvaśyakamityata āha -- ūrdhvatādisādhāraṇeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2616: itare tu anyatra viparyaye dharmijñānasya hetutvepi vartamānavyavasāyadharmike 'vyavasāyarūpe 'pramāyāṃ pramātvaviparyaye
GSP29vytrkt1u:2617: tasyāhetutvavadanyatra saṃśaye dharmajñānasya hutvepi prāmāṇyasaṃśaye tasyāhetutvaṃ yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2618: na ca pragāropyasya prāmāṇyasyānupasthiter na tadaropa iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2619: svatastvapakṣe pramāyāṃ prāmāṇyapratimiteriva bhrame prāmāṇyāpopasyāpi tadanapekṣatvādityāhuḥ // @--------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2621: śuktyādāveva rajatatvādyāropo nānyatretyetanniyāmakatayā rūpyādiniṣṭhacākacakyādimattayā śuktyādijñānasya tadāropahetutvamāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ -- vartamānetyādi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2623: tathā śuktirūpyādyapramāyāmapi tadanuvyavasayena tadupanītatadvatvādighaṭitaprāmāṇyaṃ dharmijñānaṃ vinaiva taduttarakṣaṇa eva paricchidyata ityupetaṃ tadvadityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2624: prāmāṇyānupasthiteḥ kathaṃ tadāropa ityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na cetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2625: ata eva pūrvapakṣe maṇikṛtāpyuktam“apramāpi prametyeva gṛhyate“ityādīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2626: atrārucibījaṃ tu jñānagrahasya sākṣitvātprāmāṇyasandehasya mānasatvāt jñānagraheṇa ca prāmāṇyacagraheṇa
GSP29vytrkt1u:2628: dharmijñānahetutvaṃ tena prāmāṇyaniścayaṃ copetya saṃśayopapādanaṃ prakārāntareṇa darśayati -- anyotviti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2631: anye tu saṃśayasthalepyuktarītyā sāmagrīsatvenādāvevānuvyavasāyena prāmāṇyaniścayepyanuvyavasāyanāśāntaraṃ smṛtyupanīte vyavasāye tatsaṃśayoyukta eva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2632: nahyanuvyavasāyakāla eva saṃśayo na tu tadavyavahitottarakāla iti yogādisaṃpatti vinā jñātuṃ śakyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2636: tadā vyavasāyasyāpi dharmiṇo nāśānna saṃśaya ityata āha -- smutīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2638: nanūpanītasya kathaṃ saṃśaye viśeṣyatayā bhāvamityata āha -- paramatepīti//
GSP29vytrkt1u:2639: atrāpi kalpe saṃśayā 1 disthale jñānagrahasya sākṣitvātprāmāṇyagrahasya ca mānasatvānmānasaprāmāṇyaniścayasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:2641: sadā satvena tena prāmāṇyāgraheṇa jñānagraheṇa prāmāṇyagrahaṇamupetya tannāśena saṃśayopapādanasyāśakyatayā
GSP29vytrkt1u:2652: pratibandhadaśāyāṃ kāryājananamātreṇa śakteḥ sahajatvābhāve vahnbhāve dāhādiśakteḥ sahajatvamiti vyavasthityanupapatterityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2654: -- vaktuṃ śaktamiti bhāvenātropanyāsa iti bhāvaḥ -- etadapīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2658: paratastve prāmāṇyajñānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ saṃvādādiliṅgajanyānumitirūpeṇānyena 1 jñānena grāhyam,
GSP29vytrkt1u:2661: hetavaḥ santu svatogrāhyatvarūpasādhyaṃ māstvityatra vipakṣe bādhakasya sādhyasādhane 'nukūlatarkasyābhāvāditi na cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2662: pūrvaṃ 2 kvaciddhetāvaprayojakatvoddhārasya prātisvikarūpeṇa kṛtatvepi sāmānyatoyamuddhāra ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2665: grahaṇāṅgīkare 'navasthānāt“iti ṭīkāṃ vivṛṇvāno maṇyādyuktidiśaivānvasthādvayamāha-- paratastva iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2666: jñāna 3 grāhakasākṣivyatiriktena yena kenāpi grāhyatva ityarthaḥ-- phalamukhīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2670: evaṃ prāmāṇyasyānumeyatve liṅgavyāptyādijñānaprāmāṇyāniścaye 'siddhyādiprasaṅgena tanniścayārthaṃ liṅgā 1 dyantaraṃ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:2673: na ca yatra doṣaśaṅkādirūpākāṅkṣā tatraiva saṃvādāpekṣeti nānavastheti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2674: tathātve pratibandhanirāsārthameva saṃvādāpekṣā na tu prāmāṇyagrahārthamiti manmatapraveśāpatteḥ / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2675: kāraṇāntarānava 2 sthopalakṣaṇatayaikatrānasthānirdhāraṇāya vā parābhyupagamānurodhena vānumeyatva ityāpādakanirthāraṇoktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2679: jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyamanumitigrāhyaṃ anumitiprāmāṇyaṃ tu svata iti pracīnamate phalamukhānavasthābhāvātkāraṇāmukhyā apyuktirityeke /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2683: yatra tu prāmāṇyajñāne 'prāmāṇyaśaṅkayā prāmāṇyasaṃśayastatra prāmāṇyajñānaprāmāṇyaniścayādeva prāmāṇyaniścaya ityādimaṇyuktamāśaṅkate-- na ca yatreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2693: kṛṣyādau sandehātpravṛttāvapi bahuvittavyavasāyasādhye pāratrikaphalage 1 yāgādau niṣkampapravṛtyarthaṃ prāmāṇyasyāpyavaśyavedyatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2702: etena caramaprāmāṇyajñānasya jñānābhāvena kocismaraṇābhāvena viṣayāntarasañcāreṇa vā prāmāṇyasaṃśayānivaśyaṃbhāvānnānavastheti
GSP29vytrkt1u:2706: “yatrāprāmāṇyasaṅkā nāsti karakalādijñāne tatra vyavasāya evārthaniścayaḥ tata eva niṣkampapravṛttiḥ“ityādimaṇyādyuktamāśaṅkate -- nanu tatrāpīti
GSP29vytrkt1u:2712: pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ ityādā 1 vākārāntarārtho 1 llekhābhāvena śaṅkhaḥ pītatvenaiva bhātītyanubhavena caikākāraniyate saṃśayānyajñānarūpe
GSP29vytrkt1u:2715: evaṃ tarhyaprāmāṇyasyāpyanumeyatvena tadananumitidaśāyāṃ pītārthinaḥ pṛvṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2718: atha prāmāṇyavirodhijñānaviraho na sahakārī kiṃ tu pravartakatāvacchedakaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:2719: yadvār 1 'taniścaya eva pravartakaḥ 3 aprāmāṇyādijñānaṃ pratibandhakaṃ pratibandhakāntarasampādakaṃ vā,
GSP29vytrkt1u:2720: iti vikalpān hṛdi kṛtvādyovyabhicārityāha -- pīta iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2726: prāmāṇyajñānapravartakatvamadyāpi na siddhamiti kathaṃ tadabhāvānnavṛttirāpādyata ityastatsādhayati -- kiṃñceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2727: 1. dau vdyākārārtho - kuṃ - anekākārārtho- kha. 2. rūpapadaṃ na - kha. 3. etāvannāsti - kuṃ. 4. vākaroti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2728: śukleveti vāśabdarūpavākārāntaretyarthaḥ-- kuṃ. ā. 5. vdyākārārtheti kvacitpāṭhaḥ -- ā. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2735: abhāvānāṃ prāmāṇyaviścayavirodhyabhāvatvenaikatve tvāvaśyakatvāllāghavācca prāmāṇyaniścaya eva sahakārī /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2739: na cāprāmāṇyaśaṅkābhāvaḥ kḷptaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayastu kalpya iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2745: anavasthā tu nirasiṣyata iti bhāvaḥ -- kḷpta iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2762: tadabhāvātpītaḥ śaṅkha 2 iti jñānānna pravṛttiriti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2769: evaṃ kḷptatve gauravasyādauṣatve ca prāmāṇyaniścayasyāpravartakatvamupetyāprāmāṇyājñānasahitārthaniścayasyaiva pravartakatva ityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2777: anyathā anumityādau sahacārādijñānameva hetuḥ vyabhicāritatvādinājñātatvaṃ kāraṇatāvacchedakamiti syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2779: pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādau tvaprāmāṇyajñānaṃ pravṛtta pratibandhakamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2781: pratibandhakatvepi manmate śaktivighaṭakatvena pratibandhakatvepi yathā jātiviśeṣarahitasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:2784: pratibandhakateti vaktavye arthaniścayasya pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādau satvena tadvighaṭanāsaṃbhavāttena
GSP29vytrkt1u:2790: vyāpteryathetyādinā vivakṣita 6 tvānmaṇyādau nirviṣaye vyabhicā 7 ro neti bhāvena
GSP29vytrkt1u:2792: 1. ttaddhi -mu. 2. ṇyādi - cha kha. 3. etenaivetyuktaṃ -mu. 4. nirviśeṣasyetyādinā- mu. 5. vakṣyamāṇavyāptau - ā a. 7. ranirāsāya - ā a. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2795: jñānaṃ hi jñānāntarasya viṣayadvāraiva virodhīti svaviṣayaviruddhaviṣayakameva jñānaṃ vighaṭayati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2797: svābhāvarūpahetuvighaṭanatayā anumityādipratibandhakaṃ vā sahacīrādijñānagataśaktivighaṭakatvena pratabandhakaṃ vā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2802: nanu jñānamapi maṇyādivadbādhapratipakṣavacca kāraṇībhūtasvābhāvavighaṭanarūpatayaivāstu pratibandhakaṃ kiṃ kāraṇībhūtajñānavighaṭakatayetya āha -- jñānaṃ hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2805: astu jñānaṃ hītyādinoktamaprāmāṇyajñānaṃ tu bādhādivatsyādītyata āha -- jñānaniṣṭheti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2808: kiṃ tu prāmāṇyaniścayasyaiveti 2 tadghaṭakatayaiva pratibandhakamiti prāmāṇyajñānasya hetutvasiddhiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2810: janakajñānavighaṭakatvamanupetya bādhavatpravṛtto svakāraṇībhūtābhāvavighaṭanarūpatvenaiva pratibandhakatve doṣāntaramāha // kiñceti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2814: tato varamekaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayo hetuprāmāṇyādijñānaṃ tu tadvighaṭakamiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2824: nanvevaṃ maṇyādyabhāvasthale maṇimantrādyabhāvakūṭasya kāraṇatā kḷptapteghanīyaṃ prāmāṇyajñānamiti kimarthamatigauravāśrayaṇamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2831: mānasārthasandehasyāpi pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādāvuktarītyārthaniścaya 1 sadbhāvena tadvighaṭakatvāyogena sadarthatvarūpaprāmāṇyaniścayavighaṭanenaiva pratibandhakatvasyaivocitatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2836: yadyapi paraprakriyayā na niścitaprāmāṇya 4 jñānaṃ pravartakam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2847: āśuvināśino jñānasya pravṛttikāle 'bhāvātkathaṃ pramātvena jñātasya pravartakatvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2848: uktaṃ ca maṇau“jñānaṃ gṛhītaprāmāṇyaṃ na pravartakam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2851: 1. sya - kha. 2. syaiva - cha. 3. nupapatyaiva - ga. 4. ka - kuṃ. /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2856: tathāpi manmate sākṣirūpasya sukhādijñānasya svaprakāśatvena svasyaiva svaprāmāṇyaniścayarūpatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2857: ghaṭādijñānasya tu paragrahyatvepi tadgāhakeṇa nityena sākṣiṇā pramāṇatvevaiva grahaṇāttasya ca svaprakāśatvenānavasthābhāvānniścitaprāmāṇyameva jñānaṃ pravartakam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2858: kiñcādye jñāne prāmāṇyaniścayena kathaṃ dvitīye tacchaṅkābhāvaḥ // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2860: “yadi sākṣī svayaṃ bhāto na mānaṃ kena gamyate /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2865: iti jñānapādīyānuvyākhyāne cokteriti bhāvaḥ -- ghaṭādijñānasya tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2882: nanu yadīdaṃ rajataṃ na syā 1 ttadā rajatatvaprakārakapramāviṣayo nasyāditi tarkaprabhāvādvitīye śaṅkābhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2888: “aprāmāṇyaśaṅkāpratibandhadvārā niṣkampapravṛttāvupayujyate prāmāṇyajñānaṃ“iti maṇyukterityato dvitīyajñānepi prāmāṇyaniścaya eva pravartaka iti bhāvenāha -- kiñceti dvitīya iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2890: “na ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ uttarasya jñānasya“ityādinā svatastvānumānāvasaroktarītyā kḷptasāmagrīkasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2891: anyatra kḷptatvācca dvitīyajñānādāvapi prāmāṇyaniścaya eva pravartaka iti bhāvenāha // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2904: “parataḥ 2 pakṣe prāmāṇyagraho na kvacitpravartakaḥ“iti maṇyukterasti vivādaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2906: prāmāṇyaniścayādhīnajñānānarthaṃ niścitya niṣkampaṃ pravartate“ityuktyā tatra sthale
GSP29vytrkt1u:2912: yadapi maṇau“nanvevaṃ bahuvittavyayāyāsasādhye“ityādinā prāmāṇyajñānasyānupayogamāśaṅkyāprāmāṇyaśaṅkānivartakatvenopayogakathanaṃ tadapyayuktamityāha -- kiñca prāmāṇyeti / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2917: tathāpi smṛtyupanītasya vyavasāyasya prāmāṇyaniścaya eva pravartakaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2918: yadvā tvanmate gṛhītaprāmāṇyena jñānena samānaśīlatvādaprāmāṇyaśaṅkārahitaṃ jñānāntaramivi manmate nirastapratibandhena sākṣaṇā gṛhītaprāmāṇyaṃ jñānāntarameva pravartakam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2922: aprāmāṇyaśaṅkānivṛttisthale vyavasāyasya nāśena pravṛttikāle 'bhāvātkathaṃ pramātvena jñānaṃ pravṛttiheturityāśaṅkya dvedhā samādhimāha -- yadyapītyādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:2929: evaṃ 1 prāmāṇyaniścayasya pravartakatvasādhanena tanniścayasya parate 2 jñāyamānatve
GSP29vytrkt1u:2936: na hi jñānaṃ jñātaṃ sadeva pravartakam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2939: 1. yadvā prāmāṇyaniścayasya pravartakatvapakṣe tasyāvaśyavedyatvepyaprāmāṇyaśaṅkāśūnyārthaniścayasya pravartakatvapakṣe tadananaśyakatvānnānavasthetyata āha 1 /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2942: yadyapi siddhānte parīkṣāyāprāmāṇyaśaṅkānivṛttāveva sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyaniścayena prāmāṇyaniścasyāprāmāṇyaśaṅkābhāvārthatvaṃ nāsti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2944: tasminniraste sākṣī svamahimnaiva prāmāṇyaṃ gocarayati“iti tatvanirṇayaṭīkādyukteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2945: tathāpi“yatra tu prāmāṇyajñāne 'prāmāṇyaśaṅkayā prāmāṇyasaṃśayaḥ tatra prāmāṇyajñāne prāmāṇyaniścayādeva prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ“itimaṇyuktestaṃ pratyetadāpādanamityadoṣaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:2946: nanu tacchaṅkābhāvaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayarūpapratibandhādiva svahetvabhāvādapi saṃbhavatīti bhāvena“prāmāṇyaniścayānavaśyaṃbhāvāt“iti maṇyādyuktaśaṅkate
GSP29vytrkt1u:2950: na tāvaditi -- koṭyasmaraṇaṃ cāyuktamiti kalpāpekṣayā tāvacchabdaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2951: ajñānaṃ hi tadarthayogyatvābhāvena vā sannikarṣādisāmagryabhāvena vā sahakārivihaprayuktasāmagryabhāve ----- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:2954: yogyasya dharmiṇo jñānasya manassaṃyuktātmasamavāyarūpasamprayogavatvenaivotpatyā jñānatvena 1 jñānajñānasāmagryāḥ satvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2955: na ca jñānajñāne bubhutsā hetuḥ sā ca sārtrikīti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2963: su 4 svādyanubhavarūpasākṣyāśeyena vāyaṃ granthaḥ siddhānte yojyaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2964: satyapi dharmijñāne sādhāraṇadharmādarśanādasandeha iti śaṅkāpanodāyoktaṃ jñānatvena jñānajñānaneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2974: 1. ekaṃ jñānapadaṃna - mu. 2. pustake nāsti - mu. /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2981: na ca dharmyajñānarūpaphalabalātsukhādusāmagrī tajjñānasāmagrī vā 1 jñānapratibandhikā kalpyata iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2985: jñānatvarūpasādhāraṇadharmadarśanasya yāgādau niṣkampapravṛttyarthaṃ prāmāṇyādirūpaviśeṣabubhutsāyāśya satvena tatsmaraṇasāmagryāḥ satvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2987: tathāca tatra vyabhicārānnakvāpi sā jñānajñānaheturityāha - vartamāneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:2989: yadyapi svasyedamityarthe 'ṇikṛte svaśabdasya dvārādiṣu pāṭhena“dvārādīnāñce“tisūtreṇa vakārātpūrvamaijāgamenaukāre sati sauveti bhāvyaṃ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2990: tathāpi svasmai hitamityarthe“prāk krītāccha“iti chapratyaye svīyeti sādhviti jñeyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:2997: koṭyasmaraṇaṃ ceti --“jñāne hi jñāte tatprāmāṇyānupalabdhau kathaṃ saṃśayo na syāt“iti tatvanirṇayaṭīkāṃ vivṛṇvā 2 na āha -- jñānatveti // @--------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3002: na hi prekṣāvanto bahuvittavyayāsasādhye sādhanatvāniścayepi 1 viṣayāntarasañcārasampāditāsandehamātreṇa caityavandanādau pravartante /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3003: kiñcoktarītyā sampannasāmagrīkeṇa kḷptena prāmāṇyaniścayenaivāsandehasambhave kathaṃ viṣayāntarasañcārādikalpanam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3004: api ca viṣayāntarasañcārepi sukhādijñānaprāmāṇye niyamenāsandeho dṛśyata iti nāsāvasandehahetuḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3009: na ceti -- parakīyapravṛttihetubhūtaḥ śaṅkābhāvaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayahetuka eva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3010: na tu viṣayāntarasañcārahetuka iti tu durjñānamityata āha -- kiñcoktarītyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3015: samamiti -- atrāpi sāmagryāḥ bādhoddhāragrantha upapāditatvāditi bhāvaḥ / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3018: etena śaṅkāviśrāntibhūmau sukhādijñāne prāmāṇyavyāpyasya sukhajñānatvāderviśeṣasya darśanādevāsaṃśaya iti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3023: yadapi“viśeṣadarśānānna tatrāprāmāṇyaśaṅkā“iti maṇivacanaṃ tadvivaraṇapūrvaṃ tadapi netyāha /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3029: janmeti atiprasaṅgitvāditi -- jñānahetukatvavyabhicārasthale sarvatraivaṃ parihārasambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3032: niśśaṅkaṃ pravṛttāvavaśśevedyatvāt“iti tatvanirṇayaṭīkāvākyoktaṃ niśśayaṅkapravṛtyarthaṃ taddhetvaprāmāṇyaśaṅkābhāvārthaṃ cāvaśyavedyamityatītavādatraye copapādyopasaṃharati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3033: tasmāditi -- atītavādoktadīśā niśśaṅkapravṛtyarthaṃ atra vāde uktadiśā dharmyajñānādinā śaṅkabhāvāyogenāprāmāṇyaśaṅkābhāvārthaṃ ca prāmāṇyaniścacasyāpekṣitatvādityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3038: nanu tvanma 1 te yadyapi prāmāṇyagrahaṇārthaṃ saṃvādavisaṃvādabhāvārūpaparīkṣā nārekṣitā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3040: tathā catatrāpidoṣaśaṅkāyāṃ tannirāsāya parīkṣāntaramityanavasthā tulyaiveti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3046: “avaśyaṃ tatsvataḥ prāmāṇyagrahaṇavādināpyaṅgīkartavyaṃ“ityādi ṭīkāryaṃ niṣkṛṣya vaktuṃ svamate 'navasthādoṣaṃ śaṅkāpūrvamuddharati -- nanvityādinā // uktaṃ hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3049: evaṃ parastve anavasthādvayoktyā svatastvahetūnāmaprayojakatvaṃ nirasya vipakṣe 'numityasaṃbhavabādhakāntarādapi nāprayojakāḥ svatastvahetava iti bhāvenāha---
GSP29vytrkt1u:3055: pravṛttigatasaṃvādarūpavaucitryeṇa taddhetujñāne vaicitryānumānepi vahnyarthipravṛttihetorvahnitvavati vahnitvaprakārakatvādirūpaprāmāṇyasya viśiṣyāsiddheḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3056: na ca prāmāṇyamātraniṣedhe vyāghātadaṇḍabhayena viśeṣyavṛttiprakārakatvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3057: sāmānyata 1 eva prasiddhaṃ vahnijñāne sādhyajñānaṃ pakṣadharmatābalādvahnitvavati
GSP29vytrkt1u:3059: nanuktamatra maṇau“prathamaṃ ca prāmāṇyajñānaṃ vyatirekiṇā“iti tatrāha -- aprasiddheti 2 //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3061: nanu saṃvādapravṛttihetuvilakṣaṇahetusādhyā tadvilakṣaṇakāryatvādityanumānena siddhyādvaisakṣaṇyaṃ prāmāṇyarūpameva setsyatītyata āha -- pravṛttīti
GSP29vytrkt1u:3068: sādhyamānamiti -- vahnijñānaṃ viśeṣyavṛttiprakārakaṃ samarthapravṛttihetutvāditi vyatirekiṇā sādhyamanamityarthaḥ // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3069: 1. taḥ siddhaṃ - kuṃ - ga- kha. 2. aprasiddha iti - mu. 3. ṣyakatvādi - kuṃ vahnyavṛttiprakārāvacchinnatvādirādipadārthaḥ - a. 4. dvyana - kuṃ.
GSP29vytrkt1u:3076: na ca tatra 1 prāgbhavīyasaṃskārajanyā smṛtirūpā tatprasiddhiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3078: atha prathamaṃ ayaṃ vahnitvenānubhavo vahnitvaprakārakatve sati --- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3080: nanu svārthānumāne parakīyavyāghācānavatārepi svakīyaprāmāṇyaniṣedhānupapattyaiva tatsiddhiḥ syādityata āha //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3081: svayamiti - tathā ca sā dhīreva kathaṃ syāditi mṛgyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3083: tanmātraṃ smṛtaṃ vahnijñānādau sādhyamānaṃ“ityādinā maṇigṛduktaṃ tatsampradāyavidāṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3086: upapattāviti -- tadupapattiprakāraśca bādhoddhāragranthe saṃśayopapādanagranthādaucokta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3087: “vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ prathamaprāmāṇyābhāva eva prāmāṇyaṃ vyatirekiṇāsādhyaṃ“ityādinoktaṃ maṇikṛdabhimataṃ pakṣamāśaṅkate -- atheti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3096: abhāvasādhyake 1 vyatirekiṇi sādhyaprasiddhiṃ vinaiva sādhyābhāvarūpasya 2 bhāvasya hetvabhāvyāpyatvagrahāt / @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3098: 4 evaṃ ca atra vahnitvamiti jñāne vahnitvābhāvavadvahnitvaviśeṣyakatvasatvepi viśeṣaṇābhāvaprayuktaviśiṣṭābhāvarūpasādhyasatvānna vyabhicāraḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3104: evamapyatra vahnitvamiti jñāne vyabhicāra iti cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3106: nanu prāmāṇyaniścayābhāve kathaṃ pravṛttirityata āha -- tata eveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3108: prāmāṇyaviśyasyāpi tanmate tatraivopayogāditi bhāvaḥ -- abhāvasādhyaka iti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3111: 1. kevala - ga. 2. pabhā- kuṃ. 3.“na“iti nāsti -mu.ā. 4. ayaṃ granthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3123: yatrāprāmāṇyaṃ tatra samarthapravṛttijanakatvābhāva iti hetvābhāvena vyāpyatvagrahasambhavā1 diti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3124: vahnitvaprakārakatve satīti viśeṣaṇavaiyarthyaṃ manvānaḥ pakṣadharādyuktasādhyaniṣkarṣamāha -- yadveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3125: kathaṃ tarhi tadabhāvavati tatprakārakatvarīpāprāmāṇyasyābhāvaḥ siddhyetyata āha -- pakṣeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3126: uktahetorvahnitvaprakārakatvarūpāprāmāṇyaniṣedho viśeṣaṇābhāvo bādhādviśeṣyābhāvamādāyaiva viśiṣṭaniṣedhe paryavasatīti tanmātrābhāvasādhane viśiṣṭābhāvaḥ siddhyatīrthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3129: tasya nirviṣayakatvena tatra sādhyasatvaniścayāditi bhāvaḥ -- anityeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3133: 1. dityarthaḥ - ā. kuṃ. 2. vahnitvā -ā. mu. 3. atra ca vahnitvaprakārakaniścayatvādityapi hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ dhyeyam -a. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3136: pakṣadharmatayā pakṣasambandhasidhyā tathānupa 2 sthāpitasyoktarūpaprāmāṇyasya pakṣasambandhabodhane tasyā asāmarthyāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3137: etena aprāmāṇyābhāvānumityanantaraṃ ayaṃ vahnitvenānubhavo vahnitvalavadviśeṣyakaḥ avanhyaviśeṣyakatve sati --- @--------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3139: anyathā hetoḥ pakṣasaṃbandho na ghaṭata ityāśayena“tadabhāvavati tatprakārakatvavyatirekatvavyatirekaḥ siddhyaṃstadvati tatprakārakatvamādāya siddhyati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3142: yaddharmāvacchinnanirūpitavyāptiryaddharmāvacchinnasya gṛhītā taddharmāvacchinnasya pakṣadharmatayā taddharmāvacchinnasyaiva siddhiḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3144: na cāyaṃ niyamo 'nvayini hetau na vyatirekiṇīti śaṅkyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3146: vyatirekasahacāreṇānvayavyāptirgṛhīta iti matābhīprāmāyeṇa vā vyatirekiṇyapi hetvabhāvavyapyābhāvaviṣayatvanaiyatvanaiyatyābhiprāyeṇavaivamuktiḥ-- tasyā iti //“idaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3147: vahnitvaprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ vahnitvavadviṣayakaṃ“ityādinā maṇyuktaṃ pakṣāntaraṃ nirāha -- eteneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3156: yadi tu bādhānantaraṃ smṛtyupanīte bhrame vahnitvābhāvavati vahnitvena jñānaṃ mama vṛttamityaprāmāṇyaṃ manasā paricchidyate tarhi pravṛttisāmārthyānantaraṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3161: aprāmāṇyacābhāvānumānepi vyatire 4 kavyāpyāprasiddhyā vyāptyasiddhirita bhāvenāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3167: tathā ca pañcamānuvyasāyamādāya sādhyaprasiddhyā prāmāṇyānumānasyaiva prāthamikatvasaṃbhave kiṃ prāmāṇyābhāvānumāneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3171: smṛtyupanīte vyavasāye smṛtyupanītaṃ vahnitvavaiśiṣṭyaviṣayakatvameva manasā paricchidyatām /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3172: ādāveva vā vyavasāyagataṃ tadupanītavahnitvavaiśiṣṭyaviṣayakatvamanuvyavasāyainaiva paricchidyatām kimanayā kṛsṛṣṭyā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3177: pañcamānuvyavasāyavedyatvopagame ca prathamānuvyavasāyavedyatvasya sutarāmupeyatvasyopapāditatatvāditi bhāvenāha -- ādāveva veti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3181: evaṃ dveṣādāviti tatra prasiddhaṃ vahnijñāne sādhyatām /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3185: evamanumayatvapakṣe prāmāṇyasyāprāmāṇyasya cāprasiddhyuktyā tannirūpitavyaptyāsiddhimuktā hetoḥ pramityasiddhimāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3191: kintu pramātvāvacchedeneti pramātve jñāte pravṛttikāraṇatvajñānaṃ tenaiva ca pramātvajñānamityanyonyāśrayaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3195: yadi kvacinmanasā prāmāṇyagrahopagameva tatra pravṛttikāraṇatvagrahānnanyonyāśrāyastarhi prathameva prāmāṇyaṃ manasā gṛhyatām /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3201: etena dāhasamarthaviṣayakaprayatnajanakatve sati vahnitvaprakārakaniścayatvādityapi hetuḥ parāstaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3205: pramātvasamaniyatadharmāvacchedenāstu tadgraha ityāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3222: guṇajanyatvasya doṣābhāvajanyatvasya 3 doṣājanyatvasya 3 ca pramārūpakāryakalpyatvena janyatāpacchedakapramātvājñāne guṇajanyatvāderdujñānatvena cānyonyāśrayāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3229: manmate pravṛttimātraṃ na prāmāṇyajñānādhīnamiti vadantaṃ pratyāha -- maṇīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3235: manmate tu utsargataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhṇannapi sākṣī bādhānantaramuktarītyā visaṃvādalakṣaṇādapavādādaprāmaṇyamapi gṛhṇāti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3238: yā tu viṣṇutatvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ“anumeyamevāprāmāṇyaṃ“ityuktiḥ sā sākṣiṇo 2 'prāmāṇyagrahaṇe visaṃvādāpekṣā niyatetyabhipretya /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3242: tatra janmāntarīya saṃskārānusaraṇasya vā prathamaṃ prāmāṇyābhāvānumānadvārānusaraṇasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:3243: vā pañcamānuvyavasāyaprasiddhatvānusaraṇādervā kāryatve mamāpi sāmyadityata āha -- manmate tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3246: svata evāstu kiṃ visaṃvādenetyata āha -- uktarītyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3248: visaṃvādādyanusandhāne satyeva gṛhyate“ityādinā“svato 'prāmāṇyagrahe asāmarthyāt ityādeḥ svatastvānumānavāde uktatvāttatroktarītyetyarthaḥ -- uktaṃ hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3264: iti ca / tasmātprāmāṇyasya paratastve prāthamikaṃ tajjñānameva na sambhavatīti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3266: paratastve prāthamika 1 prāmāṇyānumiterevāsambhaveneyaṃ pramā iyaṃ tvaprameti vyavasthityasambhavādityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3272: evaṃ svatastvānumānānāṃ bādhaṃ vipakṣe 'navasthādvayasyānumityasambhavasya coktyāprayojakatvaṃ coddhṛtya paroktānumānavirodhanirāsāya tāni dūṣayitumanuvadati -- yacceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3273: paroktasvatastvānirūktibhaṅgena saṃśayasyānyathopapādanena ca paroktahetūnāmaprayojakatvādyuktāvapi prabaladoṣoktyarthaṃ punarārambhaḥ / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3276: -- kṣaṇaṃ 1 vṛttisamānādhakaraṇasaṃśayaviṣayī 2 bhūtaṃ jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ grāhyajñānaprakāraprakārakatayā tadviśeṣyaviśeṣyakatayā ca svāśrayagrāhakayāva 3 jjñānāgrāhyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3279: yathā sādhyamuktaṃ tadabhāva iha sādhyaṃ jñeyaṃ“iti pakṣadharāditadīyaṭīkoktarītyā
GSP29vytrkt1u:3281: kimavacchedena vivādaviṣayaityajñānāttadabhimataṃ vivādaniyāmakaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ ṭīkādyanuktamapi svayaṃ vyaktīkṛtavāniti jñeyam / svasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:3283: tadviṣayaniścayasamānādhikaraṇo yaḥ saṃśayaḥ tadviṣayī 5 bhūtaṃ jñānaprāmāṇyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3284: saṃśayāviṣaye prāmāṇye tathā niścate vyadhikaraṇasaṃśayaviṣaye tathā caturthakṣaṇavartisaṃśayaviṣaye 6 yatkiñcidavadhikatṛtīyakṣaṇavartisaṃśayaviṣaye cīsiddhityato viśeṣaṇāni /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3285: jñānaprāmāṇyāṃśasyādhikasyātrapraveśānna 7 pakṣatāvacchedakaikyanimittaṃ siddhasādhanaṃ śaṅkyam aprāmāṇyeva siddhasādhanatānirāsāya jñānaprāmāṇyamityuktiḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3296: atra maṇyuktamekaṃ sādhyaṃ vipratipattāvuktasādhyāntarasyāpyupalakṣaṇaṃ matvā dūṣaṇasaukaryāya svayamāha -- tajjñāneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3297: 1 tadartho viśeṣaṇa kṛtyaṃ ca paroktasvatastvaniruktibhaṅge vyaktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3305: tenātra pūrvatra ca na vyavasāye vyabhicāraḥ 3 //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3306: svāśrayaniścaye 'prāmāṇyasaṃśayaṃ vinā 4 sandihyamānatvāt iti maṇyuktyabhamataṃ hetuṃ vyanakti -- svāśrayaviṣayakakiñcidityādi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3308: 1. etada-kuṃ-a-ā. 2. lābha-kuṃ-a-ā. 3. ayaṃ granthaḥ-a. pustake nāsti.
GSP29vytrkt1u:3313: yadvā uktahetutatrayamadhye ekaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ kṛtvānyau hetūkartavyau //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3318: kintu yatkiñcidanuvyavasāyarūpaniścaya evābhimata iti bhāvena kiñcinniśyadharmiketyuktam -- aprāmāṇyavaditi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3320: matadvayepi tasya paratastve sādhyahetī saṃmatāviti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3321: hetupakṣatāvacchedakaikyanibandhanasiddhasādhanatā 1 śaṅkāpi yathā na bhavati tathā pakṣātāvacchedakīkṛtya dvitīyatṛtīyau vādyatṛtīyau vā hetūkartavyāvityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:3323: vastuto yadanuvyavasāyānantaraṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇe saṃśayaviṣayībhūtaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadvyakterevaitatpadena grahaṇam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3336: ādya 2 hetau rajatatvādirūper'thepi kiñcidavadhakatṛtīyakṣaṇa 3 vuttisaṃśayaviṣayatvasya. tathā svāśrayaniścayāvadhikacaturthalakṣaṇavṛttisaṃśayaviṣayatvasya,
GSP29vytrkt1u:3338: evaṃ svatastvavādimātrasādhāraṇaṃ vā gurubhinnasvatastvavādimātrasādhāraṇaṃ vā dvedhā
GSP29vytrkt1u:3339: prayogaṃ maṇyabhamataṃ pradarśya anabhyāsadaśāpannajñānaprāmāṇyaṃ na svāśrayagrāhyamiti
GSP29vytrkt1u:3342: uktasaṃśayaviṣayībhūprāmāṇyasyaiva vyavasāyaprāmāṇyapadena grahaṇamiti dyotanāya vimatamityuktiḥ-- tasmāditi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3354: 1 tadvāraṇāya krameṇa svāśrayaniścayāvadhikatvena tṛtīyakṣaṇa 2 vṛttitvena samānādhikaraṇatvena ca saṃśayo viśeṣitaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3356: anantaraṃ jñānatvanirvikalpakaṃ vinā jñānāṃśaṃ nirvikalpasya ghaṭāṃśe savikalpakasya narasiṃhākārasya dharmijñānarūrasyānuvyavasāyasyotpattiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:3360: ādye pūrvadaladvayena tava ghaṭatvaprakārakaṃ jñānaṃ tava ghaṭatvavadviśeṣyakaṃ jñānamitiśabdajñānayoḥ siddhasādhananirīsaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3362: dvitīye ādyona jñānapadena tatpadasya prāmāṇyaparāmarśitāpatyā bādhanirāsaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:3379: dvitīyahetāvapi tṛtīye pramāṇyasaṃdehakṣaṇe 'nuvyavasāyanāśātprāmāṇyasaṃśayaghaṭitā yār'thasaṃdehasāmagrī tasyā 1 anuvyavasāyasamakālīnatvaṃ nāstīti nārthe vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3384: idaṃ rajataṃ na vetyevaṃ rūpeṇārthasandeha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3389: viśeṣaṇaṃ vyarthaṃ evaṃ ca nārthe naikāntyamityāśaṅkya tatsārthakyaṃ vaktumāha-- natviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3390: dvītīyaheturmaṇikṛdabhimata evotprokṣito na sākṣādukta iti evameva tasyābhimatiḥ 5 kiṃ sāmagrīpadaprakṣepeṇetyato 'siddhirūpabādhakopadarśanetatkṛtam
GSP29vytrkt1u:3392: paṭajñānasyāpi grāhyaprāmāṇyāśrayatayā tadgrāhyakānuvyavasāyagrāhyatvena sādhyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ-- viśeṣata iti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3404: svatastvapakṣe 'nuvyavasāyasyaiva prāmāṇyaniścayarūpatvāt dvitīye tatsthitikṣaṇe tadabhāvaghaṭitā yā saṃśayasāmagrī tadabhāvena tṛtīyakṣaṇe prāmāṇyasaṃśayānupapatteḥ // @-------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:3405: tathā ca tasyāpyanuvyavasāyagrāhyatayā taddharmikaprāmāṇyasaṃśayajanyasaṃśayayogyatvena hetvabhānna vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ -- nāsiddhiriti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:3407: tasya prāmāṇyaniyamena kadāpi tatra 4 sandehābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:3417: ata eva dvitīye prāmāṇyaniścayasthitikṣaṇe tadabhāvaghaṭisaṃśayasāmagryabhāvena prāmāṇyasya svāśrayaniścayasamānakālīnasāmagrījanyasaṃśayaviṣayatvāyogāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:3428: uktarūpeṇa svāśrayagrāhakatvasya prāmāṇyagrāhakatvarūpatayā tādṛśenānumityādinā grāhyatvasya paramatepi siddhatvāttadabhāvasādhane 'pasiddhāntaḥ

GSP29vytrkt1u:6516: anyathā“ṛgveda evāgnerajāyata yajurvedo vāyoḥ sāmaveda ādityāt“iti śrutyāsarvajñasyāgnyaderapi vedapraṇetṛtvaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6531: ekasminvākye anekeṣāṃ svatantrapraṇetṛtvaṃ na yuktamityetadityarthaḥ -- gauraveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6536: tathāpi neśvaravatsarvapuruṣeṣvapi pralaye cira 1 tadaviratasya kṛtsnasya vedasya pravartakā iti na teṣu vedahetutvavyavahāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6538: “yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vedāṃ śca prahiṇoti tasmai”//
GSP29vytrkt1u:6543: krama 2 viśeṣaviśiṣṭā varṇā eva ve 3 dāḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6546: chandāṃsi jajñire tasmādityādeḥ sampradāyapravartakatvena gatyuktirayuktā heterasiddherityata āha -- īśvaropi hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6554: kramasyoktadiśā kathaṃ citpuruṣādhīnajanmavatvena kṛtakatvasambhave pyānupūrvyucchedastu na yukta eveti tu śabdārthaḥ -- ityuktamiti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6558: tataśca sarveṣāṃ sarvathā varṇaviṣayavivakṣitakramopādhibhūtabudhyuparama eva vede 1 vināśo vaktavyaḥ / na tu
GSP29vytrkt1u:6566: kintu kramavyatyāsopi tatretyanityatvamiti bhāvena tatvanirṇayoktamevāha -- purāṇādīnāmiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6577: vaidikavidhipratyayenaiva 2 vedasya pauruṣeyatvamati tu vidhivāde ni 3 rasiṣyate //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6582: yastu pauruṣeyatvaṃ nopaiti taṃ prati vidhireva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6583: garbha iva śrutikumāryāḥ puṃyoga 6 pramāṇam“iti vidhivād maṇikṛdukteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6586: iti smṛtyaktyā nirastatvepi viśiṣya na nirastamityāśaṅkāmanūdya
GSP29vytrkt1u:6597: nanu yaduktamīśvarasya sārvajñyādikamaprāmāṇikameva bahu kalpyamiti tanna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6614: adṛṣṭādvārikā yā svopādānagocarā sākṣādeva svopādānagocarā yā janyā kṛtiḥ tajjanyāni ghaṭādīni tadbhinnāni samavāyavṛtyā sthitāni pṛthivyādīnītyarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6623: tathā janyakṛtyajanyatvaṃ hi janyakṛtijanyānyatvamiti maṇāvevottaratrokterjanyakṛtijanya 2 bhinnetyapyanuvāda ityadoṣaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6624: bhāveti // samavetāni janyānītyatra bhāvakaryāṇīti vā prayojyamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt1u:6625: adṛṣṭaprāgabhāva 3 vyāpya prāgabhāvapratiyogīti sādhyāṃśasya pariṣkārapūrvakamanuvādaḥ -- svajanyetyādi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6627: svajanyaṃ yadadṛṣṭaṃ tatprāgabhavyāpyo yaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ adṛṣṭakāraṇībhūtajñānādiprāgabhāvaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6628: tatpratiyogi ca yatkiñcidupādānabhūtahavirādigocarajñānādi tadbhinnāḥ svajanyādṛṣṭajanakabhinnā iti phalitārthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6632: svasya kāryasya janakaṃ yadadṛṣṭaṃ tata uttarāpakṣadharoktadiśādṛṣṭādhikaraṇakṣaṇottarakṣaṇavartinyaḥ na tu taduttarakṣaṇotpattimatyaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6635: īśvarajñānādernityatayā kṣityādikāryajanakādṛṣṭottaratvāt kulālajñānāderapi ghaṭādijanakādṛṣṭottaratvāditi na dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6637: 1.vā iti nāsti -ga. 2.tvaṃ netya-a. 3.prārambhovā vyāpyapramiti yogīti sādhyāṃśa - a. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6641: atra pakṣe janyānītatyevokteḥ dhvaṃsasyāpi pakṣatvenāṃśe bādhaḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6651: hetvordhvaṃse gaganapiramāṇādau ca vyabhicāravārakaṃ viśeṣaṇadvayaṃ viśeṣyadvayaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6652: ceti vyaktamityupetya pakṣasādhyagatapadakṛtyāni dūṣaṇokti saukaryāya tadīyavyākhyānādyuktāni
GSP29vytrkt1u:6655: aṃśe bādha ityuktaṃ tadgocarajñānādijanyatvaṃ vyanakti -- tasyopādānābhāvāditi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6656: yena tadgocarajñānādijanyatvaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ -- aṃśe siddhasādhanamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6660: na cānīśvaravādinaṃ prati vyāvartyābhāvena janyapadaṃ vyartham /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6676: evaṃ ca śabdaphūtkārādīnāṃ pakṣataiveti maṇyuktaṃ hṛdi kṛtvāha -- tāvatyukta iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6683: mṛdaṅgaḥ śabdasya nimittaṃ tālvādi ca phūtkārādeḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6685: kālī nāma kācittapasvinītapasā svaśarīre gauraṃ rūpamutpāditavatīti tadrūpāderityarthaḥ -- tasyeti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6719: kācaraṇaprāgabhāvasya kāryaprāgabhāvaṃ prati vyāpyatvenāsmadādiniṣṭhādṛṣṭajanakajñānādiprāgabhāvasya svajanyādṛṣṭaprāgabhāvaṃ prati vyāpyatvena tadbhinnatvābhāvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6720: na caivaṃ kapālā 2 dirūpopādānagocaramadṛṣṭaprāgabhāvavyāpyaprāgabhāvapratiyogibhinnaṃ ca yajjñānādi tadvatāsmadādinārthāntaram /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6721: jñānecchākṛtīnāṃ svaviṣayasamavetakāryaṃ pratyeva janakatvena kapālādi gocarajñānādeḥ kṣityādyajanakatvena bādhāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6723: sarvasyāpi jīvopabhogyatayā tattadadṛṣṭārjitatvena yadaṅkurādikaṃ yajjīvādṛṣṭajanyaṃ tadadṛṣṭaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6727: yadā jñānādiprāgabhāvastadā tajjanyādṛṣṭaprāgabhāva iti saṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ -- vakroktiriti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6736: kulālaniṣṭhasya ghaṭajanakajñānādiprāgabhāvasya tanniṣṭhavihitādikriyāntaro 2 tpatsyamānādṛṣṭaprāgabhāvaṃ prati vyāpyatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6747: yadyapi pakṣadharādāvadṛṣṭapadaṃ svajanakādṛṣcaṭaparaṃ svapadaṃ ca samabhivyāhṛtapakṣadṛṣṭāntarūpakāryaparamityuktaṃ tathāpi tasminpadārthaḥ kvacidṛṣṭānta ityananugamaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6748: na cātra grandhakṛdabhimatasāmānyavyāptāvananugamo na doṣāyeti rucidattoktaṃ yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6755: atra ca bhāṣyādau sakartṛkatvaniruktāvupādānapadaprakṣepāddhvaṃsavyāvṛttasakartṛkatvasiddhyarthaṃ pakṣasādhyahetuṣu samavetopādābhāvapadāni 1 prayuktāni // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6757: tadarthaṃ ṭhakkuroktadiśā janakatvaṃ phalopadhānarūpaṃ vivikṣiṇīyamiti kleśa ityuttarasādhyāsāṅkaryāya ca svajanyetyeva vivikṣaṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ -- siddhasādhaneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6759: na sākṣāditi kṣityādijanakādṛṣṭapūrvabhāvitayā taduttarabhāvitvābhāvānna siddhasādhanamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6772: yadā tu dhvaṃsasādhāramasakartṛkatvamātreṇeśvara 1 siddhestanmtraṃ siṣādhayiṣitaṃ tadā pakṣādau samavetādipadānyanaparekṣitānyeva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6773: 2 asmiṃśca pakṣe asmadādiniṣṭhaghaṭādijanakakṛtidhvaṃsasya 3 niruktarupakṛtijanyatvena tadbhinnatvābhāvāttasya pakṣatā na syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6775: evaṃ ca kṛtidhvaṃsasya pratiyogibhūtayā kṛtyāvirodhiguṇabhūtenottarajñānena ca janyatvepi cikīrṣājanyatvābhāvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6779: pakṣatā na syādityato janyecchākṛtityajanyatvaṃ vivakṣaṇīyamityuktvā kṛtidhvaṃsādeḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6786: tasya cikīrṣātaḥ pūrvabhāvitayā tajjanakatvena taddhvaṃsājanakatvāditi bhāvaḥ -- tayorapīti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6792: na ca niścitasādhyābhāvavati sādhanasaṃdeha eva doṣo na tu sandigdhasādhyesādhanāniścayopīti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6800: anyathā tasya bhogatatsādhanetaratayā adṛṣṭājanyatvena svajanakādṛṣṭāprasiddhyoktarūpasādhyāsaṃbhavena tadaṃśe bādhāpatteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6801: uktadiśā anyonyābhāvasya pakṣātavacchedakatayā tasya tanmate 'prasiddhyā āśrayāsiddheśceti
GSP29vytrkt1u:6802: pakṣadharoktarucyā maṇau“kṣitireva vā pakṣa“ityadinā pakṣāntaramuktvopapāditaṃ tadāha --yadveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6806: kṣitereva pakṣatve maṇyuktabādhakaśaṅkā taduttaraṃ ca niṣkṛṣyāhi -- nanvityādineṣṭasiddherityantena //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6813: nanvevaṃ saṃdigdhopādhyāhitaḥ pakṣa eva vyabhicārasaṃdehopi na doṣaḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6815: atra tu kāryatvarūpahetūcchittereva bādhakatvātta 4 nniścaya iti vaiṣamyamita vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6816: pakṣ vyabhicārasaṃ 5 dehe 6 sya dūṣakatve tarkasyāpi pakṣe vyabhicārasaṃdehena praśithilamūlatvāpātāditi cenna // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6821: tāvataiveśvarasiddheriti vā ghaṭādau niścitavyāptikasya liṅgasya pakṣapakṣasamayordarśanenobhayatrāpyanumityatpatteriti 7 vārthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6822: saṃdigdhasādhyavati hetatuniścayona doṣa ityatra bādhakaṃ vakṣyamāṇasamādhimāha -- nanvityādinā adoṣatvādityantena //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6828: sādhyābhāve heturna syādityevaṃ rūpatarkasyāpi āpādyāpādakayorvyāptisaṃdehenetyarthaḥ -- vipratipatyādīti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6833: vipratipatyādijanyasya pakṣatāprayojakasya saṃśayasyānumityanukūlatve 1 nādoṣatvepyupādhyāhitasya tasyā 2 tathātvena doṣatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6834: nanvidamaprayojakaṃ nityāyāḥsarvaviṣayāyāśceśvarakṛteridānīṃ saṃdigdhatvena kṛtisāmānyasya deśataḥ kālato 3 vā
GSP29vytrkt1u:6837: ghaṭakulālakṛtirūpaviśeṣayoreva vyatirekasya kāraṇatvasya vā grahaṇenābādhe sāmānyayorapi hetutvasiddheḥ / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6840: “atha kṛtikāryayornānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyāptigrahaḥ“ityādinā maṇyuktameva dūṣyāṃśaṃ śaṅkāpūrvamanuvadati -- nanvidamityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6852: nanvavamapi dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ kulālādikṛterevānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇatvagrahaṇe 1 mānābhāvena kulālasyāhetutvāditi cenna //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6853: prayatnavadātmasaṃyogasya 2 ceṣṭādvārā ghaṭahetutayā tadviśeṣeṇatayā prayatnasyevātmano 'pi hetutvāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6854: pramāṇavākyatvena vaktṛvākyārthapramātvena kāryatvādikalpane 'pi vākyasāmānyavaktṛjñānasāmānyayostada 3 bādhādabādhana ityuktam -- ākāśādisiddhiriti
GSP29vytrkt1u:6858: kulālo ghaṭahetuḥ taddhetusaṃyogāvacchedakatvāt kapālavat ghaṭahetvātmasaṃyogavadekaprayatnavadveti mānābhāvāditi bhāvenāha //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6862: nanvātmasaṃyoge sati prayatnaṃ vinā na ceṣṭeti prayatna eva heturna tu prayatnavadātmasaṃyoga ityata āha -- saṃyogasyeti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6871: prayatnavata ātmanaḥ śarīrasya ca yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tadasamavāyikāraṇiketyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6874: svavyadhikaraṇaḥ svādhikaraṇabhinnādhikaraṇakaḥ tadīyaḥ ātmīyo guṇaḥ prayatnaḥ tavdyatirekaprayuktavyatirekapratiyogitvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6883: yadyapi maṇau“yā kriyā vyadhikaraṇayadiyaguṇajanyā“ityādivyāptyuktyā guṇajanyatvāditi heturvācyā vyāptiśca tathaiva pradarśanīyā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6884: tathāpi kriyāyā īśvara 2 guṇajanyatvepi neśvarasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇakatvamiti vyabhicarānirāsāya taṭṭīkārthānuvādo guṇavyatirekaprayuktetyādiḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6895: na caivamapyātmā hetubhūsaṃyogāvacchedaka eva na heturiti vācyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6902: tasyāṃ svavyadhikaraṇo ya āmnādivṛkṣaḥ svārambhakāvayavasambandhitvādavayavī yaśca
GSP29vytrkt1u:6915: nanu ghaṭādau jñānasya kṛtidvāraiva hetutvatkṛtiṃ ca pratīṣṭasādhanatvānumitereva hetutvātsākṣātkārasyāhetu 1 tvena sādhyalaikalyamiti cenna
GSP29vytrkt1u:6917: tatra sādhyāṃśe ghaṭādāviṣṭhasādhanatvānumitisatvepi siddhāṃśasya kapālādeḥ sākṣātkāravyatirekeṇa kṛtivyatirekadarśanenopādānasākṣātkārasyāpi hetutvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6918: na ca manaḥkriyāhetumanoviṣayakakṛtau vyabhicāraḥ samānādhikaraṇasya siddhamanoviṣayaka sākṣātkārāderabhāvāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6921: tacca na pratyakṣam“ityādinā maṇyuktāveva prakārantareṇa sādhyavaikalyatatsamādhī niṣkṛṣyānuvadati -- nanvityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6924: yanniṣṭhā yā kṛtiḥ sā tadgocarāparokṣapūrviketyasya vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6934: na ca ghaṭe siddhaviṣayakasākṣātkārajanayatvavadasiddhaviṣayakaparokṣajñānajanyatvasyāpi darśanādīśvarasya nityapratyakṣavannityānumitiḥ syāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6935: siddhaparamāṇvādiviṣayakaparokṣajñāne satyapyaparokṣatvavyatirekeṇa kṛtivyatirekasyeva sādhyāṃśajñāne satyapi parokṣatvavyatirekeṇa kṛtivyatirekasyādarśanāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:6938: yatra manasi nāstyaparokṣajñānaṃ tatra na kṛtiriti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6939: nanvevamapi siddhe karaṇecchābhāvenopādāne cikīrṣāyogātpunaḥ sādhyavaikalyamityāśaṅkāmanūdya nirāha -- yadyapīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6942: īśvare janyajñānābhāvālliṅgajanyajñānaṃ kathaṃ syāditi āha -- pratyakṣasyendriyajanyatvepi nityapratyakṣavadanumiterliṅgajanyatvepi nityānumitiḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6950: na ca tatrāpi bhagavataścikīrṣā hetutvena kalpyā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6951: evaṃ hi dveṣayonikṛtisādhyadṛṣṭāntena kṣityādeparapi dveṣavajjanyatvāpātena nityadveṣāpatteriti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6955: vyatirekasya kvāpyadarśanena sādhyāṃśa 3 syeṣṭasādhanatve jñānatvameva vaddhetuniṣṭhakṛtau
GSP29vytrkt1u:6956: prayojakam lāghavāt na tu tatra sādhyāṃśasyeṣṭasādhanatva 4 jñāna parokṣatvamapi /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6958: evaṃ ceśvarasyāpi kṣityādirūpasādhyāṃśasya 5 svaṣṭāsādhanatājñānamaparokṣarūpamastīti taddhetūpādanaparamāṇvādikṛtiryukteti na nityānumityāpattidoṣa iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6960: ca nirasyedānīṃ kṛteścikīrṣāpūrvakatve vyabhicāracodyotta 6 re maṇyukte 7 evāha -- nanu dveṣeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6968: - ta 1 tsādhanatvena jñāne cikīrṣāya eva 2 saṃbhavena bhinnaviṣayakadveṣasyāhetutvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6972: duḥkhābhāvasādhanepi tatsādhanatvena dveṣyābhāvasādhanatvena jñāne sati sādhanagocaracikīrṣāyā eva saṃbhavenetyarthaḥ -- bhinneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6974: yadi dveṣo na kṛtihetustarhi dveṣo 'līka eva bhavedityāśaṅkya pratyakṣeṇāsiddhimāha --na caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6975: evaṃ dveṣasya pravṛttirūpasādhanagocarakṛtā 3 vahetutve dveṣaviṣaye mānābhāva ityanvayaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6976: duḥkhasādhanādau nivṛttirūprayatnaṃ prati bhinnaviṣayasyāpi dveṣasyaiva hetutvāt dveṣe nivṛttirupakāryameva mānamityata uktam -- pravṛttīti
GSP29vytrkt1u:6981: nivṛttiyatnastu dveṣasādhya iti dveṣaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6984: na ca nivṛttirūprayatnābhāva eva pravṛttiriti vaiparītyaṃ śaṅkyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:6988: nanu tathāpi ghaṭādau ceṣṭāvyāpārakakṛtereva hetutvavadhāraṇāt kṣityādau ca ceṣṭāyā yogyā 1 nupalabdhibādhitatvā 2 tkṛterahetutvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6991: na ca tadā nivṛttiviraha eva neti yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6993: na caivaṃ pravṛttiyatno rāgānnittastu dvaiṣāditi kusuñjalyuktivirodhaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6997: etena yattu kusumāñjalivākyānurodhena kuta ityādimaṇivākyasya pakṣadharīyaṃ kleśanārthavarṇanaṃ tattu maṇukṛdabhiprāyājñānamūlamiti vibhāvitaṃ dhyeyam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6999: kṛtisādhyatā hastādivyāpārādvāraiva na tu sākṣāt ityādinā maṇyuktabādhaśaṅkātatsamādhī
GSP29vytrkt1u:7004: na ceṣṭākṛtyordvāribhāvāpannatayā ghaṭādau hetunā kintu pratyekameva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7006: pitāputrayoḥ paurvāparye 3 pyekatra ghaṭe dvayoḥ svātantreṇa hetutvapadupapatteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7007: tathā ca yathoktasādhye na bādha iti bhāvenāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ceti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7010: na caikasmin ghaṭe pitāputrayoriva ceṣṭākṛtyoḥ svātantryeṇa hetunā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7017: ghaṭādau kāryaviśeṣe tathā kāraṇatve ca sāmānyaviśeṣanyāyena kāryasāmānye kṛtitvenaiva hetutvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7020: kiṃ kāryamātre kṛtijanyakāryamātre vā ghaṭādikāryaviśeṣe veti hṛdi vikalpyādyadvayaṃ nirasyānte tviṣṭasiddhyā na bādha ityāha -- ceṣṭetyādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:7025: yadviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇābhāvaḥ bādhakābhāve tatsamānyorapīti nyāyena ghāṭādirūpakāryaviśeṣatvena
GSP29vytrkt1u:7033: na 1 nvathāpi jñānamanityameva kartā śarīryevetyādivyāptibādha iti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7041: syādetat kartā śarīryeva jñānamanityamevetyādiprāthamikavyāptigrahapratyakṣavirodhāt ityādinoktaśaṅkottare niṣkṛṣyānuvadati -- nanvityādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:7047: nanvathāpi kṣityādikaṃ noktasādhyavat adṛṣṭadvārakānityajñānājanyatvāt 4 ghaṭavadita satpratipakṣatvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7056: nanvanumitervyāpakāṃśe vyāpakatāpacchedakamātraprakārakatvādihāpi vyāpakaḥ kartā vyāpakatāvacchedakakartṛtvena na si 2 dhyete /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7061: nanvevamayogyasya sādhane śaśo viṣāṇavān paśutvādgovaditi śaśaśruṅgasiddhirapi syāditi āha -- ata eveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7064: nanvevaṃ kartṛmātrasiddhāvapi tadekatvaṃ kutaḥ siddhamityata āha -- katraikyaṃ tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7066: astu katraikaḥ tadgatajñānāderekatvādisiddhiḥ kathamityata āha -- tacceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7072: atrocyate / anupalabdha prākkodiṣu bhūbhūdharādiṣu kāryatvameva kutaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7078: samavetatve 4 satītyādinābhimatakāryatvahetorasiddhiṃ tāvat“kiñcānupalabdhaprakkoṭiṣu kāryatvaṃ kutaḥsiddham“ityādinā tatvanirṇayaṭīkoktāṃ prapañcayati -- anupalabdheti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7081: na ca sāvayavatvenaivoktarūpakṛtimajjanyatvaṃ sādhyatāṃ kiṃ madhye kāryatvasādhaneneti
GSP29vytrkt1u:7082: vācyam / pūrvoktarītyā kṛti 5 janyatve kāryatvasyeva sāvayavatvasyānukūlatarkābhāvāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:7088: gaga 1 nādeḥ paramāṇośca saṃyogatvena sāṃśatva 2 siddheḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7093: tasyeha pakṣī neha pakṣītyabādhitapratītyā gaganādau vyāpyavṛttitvāyogena svātyantābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇaṣūpāvyāpyavṛttitvasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:7097: nanvevaṃ gaganakālaparamāṇvāderapi saṃyogitvena sāṃśatve tulyanyāyatayā 3 śasyāpi saṃyogitvena sāṃśatvaṃ tadaṃśasyāpyovamiti paramāṇvaṃśasyāpyānantyaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7100: api copādānādirūpāvayavādiriktāṃśasatve mānābhāvāt tadrūpāṃśavatvasya gaganādāvapyabhyupagame 'nityatvāpetteścetyata āha /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7109: madhyamaparimāṇatvaṃ cettadāpyaprayojakataiva -- gaganapradeśasyeva sāṃśatvenai 3 va tadupapatteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7111: sarṣapo yāvantaṃ deśamavaṣṭabhya vartamāno dṛśyate tāvatyevānadhikatadavayavaparaṃparā gaganepyevamityaṅgīkāre tulyapiramāṇatāpatteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7112: yataḥ svāvayavaṃ vinā svatantramanavayavarūpamapakṛṣṭaparimāṇaṃ nāsti sa paramāṇurityuktervyāghātābhāvādityā 5 dyukteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7117: yathā iha pakṣītyādipratītyā pakṣyādyādhārapradeśasya madhyamapiramāṇatvepi tasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:7127: bhūmyāderupalabhyamānā bhāgāstu nāramyakarūpā avayavāḥ kintu gaganasya pradeśabhedā iva kālasya kṣaṇādaya iva cāṃśā eva santu //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7128: ata eva bhūmeḥ khananādinā pūrvāvayavanināśenāvayavyantarotpatteḥ kāryatvaṃ siddhamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7131: na ca prabhā na guṇopitu dravyamiti yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7136: pradeśabhedakṣaṇalavādīnāmaupādhikatve bhūmyavayavā 2 nāmapi tathātvamastviti bhāvaḥ -- pūrvavayavīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7140: na caivaṃ khaṇḍakṣityadau kāryatvasiddhāvapyakhaṇḍakṣityādau na siddhamiti bhāgāsiddhiriti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7155: yadatroktaṃ maṇau“tatra kṣitināśa eva kartṛtvaṃ na tu khaṇḍakṣitau“avasthitisaṃyogebhya eva tadutpatteḥ iti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7159: ekadeśanāśakartṛtve tvakhaṇḍakṣityutpattireva neti kutaḥ kāryatvaṃ kṣityāderiti bhāvenāha -- pratyābhijñeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7161: pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣityādau vāyvādyabhighātādinaikaikāvayavāpagamena pratikṣaṇaṃ tadapagamanimittanāśotpattyorupeyatvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7162: evaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ sāṃśatvadirūpeṇa vikalpya vyabhicārāsiddhyanyathāsiddhya uktāḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7165: sāvayavatvāt kṣityādikaṃ kāryaṃ cet anupalabdhaprākkoṭitvādakāryamapi syādgaganavaditi bhāvena tatsaṃvādoktyā vyanakti -- taditi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7166: kṣityādau kāryatvānumānaṃ tarkaparāhatamityetat“na cānumānāttatsiddhaḥ viparyayeṇāpyanumātuṃ śakyatvāt“iti tatvanirṇaye uktamityarthaḥ // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7170: kiñca ghaṭādau darśanamātreṇa bhūbhūdharādeḥ sāvayavatvena kāryatvānumāne rūpādau darśanamātreṇa paramāṇvādeḥ sāvayavatvaviparyayeṇa niravayavatvena kāryatvānumānaṃ 1 kiṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:7173: pūrvavākyasya tu sāvayavatvānumānāt kṣityādau kāryatvasiddhiriti na ca vācyamityartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7176: ityasiddho heturiti cet tatkimanyathānupapattirūpānukūlatarkasahitaṃ sahacāradarśana kevalaṃ vā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7186: ca paramāṇukālākāśādeḥ kāryatve kāraṇāntaramapi tasyopeyam tasyāpyevamityanavasthāpatyādidoṣa iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7199: niravayaṃ dravyamakāryameveti cet niravayaṃ vastu kāryameva rūpādivadityupapatteḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7203: samavāyasyāgre nirasiṣyamāṇatvena pari 2 māṇatvenaiva kāryatvopapatteścetyādijñeyamiti bhāvaḥ -- etadapīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7210: āsa upaveśane āste śīṅ svapne śete bhā dīptau bhātītyāderakarmakatvādasanādikāryaṃ karmasaṃpradānāpādānakārakahīnamiti karyaṃ na syādityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:7217: tathā ca kāryatvasya śarīrasukhaduḥkhādimajjanyatvādinā sahabhāvadarśanepi yathā tatra kāryatvamaprayojakaṃ tathā sa kartṛkatvepīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7218: asminpakṣe“na cānumānāttatsiddhiḥ“iti pūrvavākyasya kāryatvānumānātsakartṛkatvasiddhiriti na cetyartho dhyeyaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7219: nanu loke sakarmakākarmakādikāryaṃ dṛṣṭimityastu karmādihīnamapi kāryam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7229: “bhavetāṃ yadi vṛkṣasya vājikarṇo kathaṃ ca na /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7230: adṛ 4 ṣṭāṃ samudāyasya kaḥ śaktiṃ jātu kalpayet”//
GSP29vytrkt1u:7233: iti syādityato 'stu nāma kāryatvaṃ kartṛjanyatve prayojakaṃ tathāpi tvaduktaviśiṣṭasādhyetvaprayojakamevetyāha -- kiñcetyādinā // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7240: na caivaṃ kapālagocarakṛtyabhāvepi 2 paṭagocarakṛtyā ghaṭotpattiḥ śaṅkyā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7241: ghaṭarūpakāryaviśeṣaṃ prati kapālagocarakṛtirūpaviśeṣasya hetutayā tadrahitāyāḥ sāmānyasāmagryāḥ kāryajanakatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7242: na caivaṃ prakṛtepi kṣityupādānagocarakṛtirūpakāraṇaviśeṣaḥ kalpata iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7244: jñānacikīrṣākṛtināṃ pratyekameva hetutayā sādhyatrayopagamena militānāmahetutvātkṛterityevoktaṃ na tu jñānāderiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7253: na cānumānattatsiddhiriti pūrvavākyasthatatsiddhiśabdārthaṃ vivṛṇvanneva śaṅkāmanūdya nirāha -- nacaivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7262: na ca kapālagocarakṛtivyatirekeṇa ghaṭavyatireka iva kṣityupādānagocarakṛtivyatirekeṇa kṣitivyatireko dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7265: na tu kapālagocarakṛteraviśeṣādityata āha -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7268: vadatastavāpi saṃmata iti tādṛśakṛtistu syādeva heturiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7269: uktaṃ ca sudhāyām“adṛṣṭavatāṃ jīvātmanāmeva kartṛtvopapatteḥ“iti śāstrayonisūtre //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7270: nanvevaṃ nedaṃ sakartṛkatvaṃ tathātve bhojakādṛṣṭadvārā bhoktṛkṛtijanye ghaṭādau bhoktṛkartṛkatva vyavahārāpatteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7271: uktaṃ ca maṇau“ata eva ghaṭabhoktā na tatkartā vyavahriyata iti“iti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7275: śarīraceṣṭādihīnepi kṣityādatartari kartṛtvaṃ pāribhāṣikaṃ cet adṛṣṭadvārā kṣityādijanakakṛtimatyapi kartṛtvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:7277: nana ghaṭādāvupādāna 1 vyatirekeṇa ghaṭādivyatirekadṛṣṭyā tādṛśakṛtimati kulāle mukhyakartṛtvopapatterihāpi kṣityādyupādānakṛtimān mukhya eva kartā syādityata āha -- ghaṭādāviti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7281: ghaṭādau darśanamātreṇa tatkalpane ca tvaduktaceṣṭānirapekṣakṛtiviparītā ceṣṭā dvārakakṛtireva kalpyā syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7282: evaṃ ca kṛteḥ kāraṇatāvacchedakakṛtitvenaiva janakatā sādhyate 1 cedasmadādikṛtyā siddhasādhanam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7285: na cānumānāttatsiddhiriti pūrvavākyārthānuvādo -- ghaṭādau darśanamātreṇa tatkalpane ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7290: nanūktamatra ghaṭādau kāryaviśeṣe ceṣṭādvārakakṛtidṛṣṭāvapi yatsāmānyaviśeṣanyāyena kāryasamānye kṛtitvena hetutvāditi cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7294: ghaṭādau darśanamātrasya śarīraceṣṭādyatiprasañjakatvāt yatsāmānyaviśeṣānyāyasyā 2 kḷptānekādṛṣṭakalpanāprasaṅgabādhitatvenāgre dūṣyatvena cānavatārādi bhāvaḥ // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7300: nanvastu tarhi upādānāgocaretyādyeva sādhyamityataḥ“kāryasāmānyaṃ hi kāraṇasāmānyāyattam“iti ṭīkāṃ hṛdi kṛtvā parābhimatasādhyaṃ nirāha -- kiñcopādānetyādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:7304: kiṃ tu kṛtimātrasyaiva militānāṃ teṣāṃ svaviṣayasamavetakāryaṃ pratyeva janakatvāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7306: yatatroktaṃ ṭhakkurādāvupādānagocaratvena yasya jñānāderjanakatvaṃ tādṛśajñānādijanyajñānaṃ sādhyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7311: vakṣyamāṇadiśā lāghavena kāraṇagocarajñānāditvena janakatayoktarūpeṇa janakatvasya kvāpyakalpanāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7322: na ca havirādi kṣitiṃ prati prayojakameva na tu kāraṇamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7324: svoktadoṣaṃ mūlārūḍhaṃ darśayituṃ na cānumānāttatsiddhiriti pūrvavākyasya kṣityādyupādānagocarajñānāditvena
GSP29vytrkt1u:7327: ghaṭādau lāghavena ghaṭādikāraṇagocarakṛtitvenaiva kāraṇatāgrahāt kṣityādāvapi tathaiva kāraṇatvakalpanādityarthaḥ /.
GSP29vytrkt1u:7331: uktarūpajñānavajjanyaṃ cikīrṣāvajjanyamityatrāpyevaṃ doṣo dhyeya iti bhāvena kṛtimātrasya prāgvvayahārepi jñānāderityuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7340: yaccoktaṃ viśeṣayorananvayavyatirekeṇa vā kāraṇatvena vā sāmānyorapi kāraṇatvamiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7352: bījeti // nanu bādhakābhāva eva bījamiti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7356: anyathā tanturūpayoranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāryagatarūpasāmānyaṃ prati kāraṇatarūpasāmānyaṃ kāryagataguṇamātraṃ prati
GSP29vytrkt1u:7358: 2 tatra yadyadbādhakamupanipatati tatsarvamapi tadanuguṇaprakriyākalpanayā parihārthaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7362: nāpi dvitīyaḥ vimate sāmānyaṃ karyakāraṇabhāvāpanne bādhakaṃ vinā kāryakāraṇabhāvāpannaviśeṣasaṃbandhitvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7365: tvatpakṣe kṛtitvasya deśataḥ kālataśca vyatirekahiteśvarakṛtivṛttitvena vyatirekānavacchedakatvāt / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7376: 'pitu yatra vahnyabhāvastatra dhūmābhāva iti vyatirekaṃ pratyavacchedaka 3 bhūtavahnitvadhūmatvākhyadharmavatvanimitta eva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7377: kāryakāraṇabhāvāpanna ghaṭadaṇḍādisthale sarvatra tathā darśanena 4 sādhyavyāpakatvaṃ vyaktamiti sādhanavyāpakatvaṃ vyanakti 4 -- na cetyādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:7386: śabdādikāraṇatvena tadasiddhāvapi guṇasya samavetatvavyāptyā śabdasamavāyikāraṇatvenaiva tatsiddheśca / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7394: kiñca“dra 1 vyakāraṇatvavat samavāyikāraṇatvaṃ viśiṣṭaṃma na grāhyaṃ kintu samavāyitvasamānādhikaraṇaṃ kāraṇatvameva samavāyikāraṇatvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7396: tanmātresyāpi grahaṇasambhavāditi bhāvena sākṣiṇi vipratipannaṃ pratyanyathāpyākāśasiddhamāha -- śabdeti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7399: śabdaḥ kvacidāśritaḥ guṇatvāditi sāmānyatastadāśrayasiddhau 3 śabdoṣṭadravyātiriktadravyāśritaḥ aṣṭagravyavṛttitve bādhakopapannatve satyāśritatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt1u:7401: samavāyikāraṇatvaṃ viśiṣṭameva grāhyamiti matepi tena 5 rūpeṇākāśasiddhiprakāraṃ maṇyuktameva darśayati --nimitteti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7402: 1.'vye sama' ityeva vartate -kuṃ. 2.vārthaḥ samā -mu. nārthaḥ samā-a. 3.śabdapadaṃ na - kuṃ. 4.tyarthaḥ -a. 5.'sva'
GSP29vytrkt1u:7406: nimittakāraṇatāgrahe yatra yadā na daṇḍastatra tadā na ghaṭa iti saṃsargābhāvarūpas
GSP29vytrkt1u:7407: vyatirekasya tantratvepi samavāyikāraṇatvagrahe yanna samavāyikāraṇaṃ tatra na kāryamityanyonyābhāvarūpavyatirekasyaiva
GSP29vytrkt1u:7409: na ca samavāyibhinna iva tvanmate kṛtiviṣayibhinnaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7412: pārimāṇḍalyasyāpi svaniṣṭhaghaṭābhāvasākṣātkāraṃ prati saṃyuktasamavetaviśeṣaṇatārūpapratyāsa 1 tyantarbhūtatayā hetutveneśvarakṛtiviṣayatvāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:7417: kāryamityanyonyābhāvarūpavyatirekeṇaiva kṛtikāryayoḥ kāryakāraṇatvagrahasambhavena kṣitirūpakāryānukūlakṛtisiddhirityata āha - na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7422: tatra yanna kṛtiviṣayo na tatra kāryamiti vyatirekagrahaḥ suśaka ityata āha-- pārimāṇḍalyasyāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7426: na ca tatra ghaṭābhāvo na pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7432: abhāvapratyakṣe hi pratiyogiyogyatvaṃ vā yatra yatsatvamanupalabdhavirodhītyuktadiśā pratiyogisatvaprasañjanaprasañjitapratiyogakatvarūpamanupalabdheryogyatvaṃ vā tantram /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7434: na dvitīya ityādinoktaṃ doṣaṃ“viparyayeṇāpyanumātuṃ śakyatvāt“iti mūlārūḍhaṃ kurvanneva niṣkṛṣya darśayati -- evaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7435: bādhakābhāvena vyatirekarūpavatvasya kāraṇatve tantratve satītyarthaḥ -- paricchinneti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7451: ata evāndhasyāptākyādinā deśakālaviśeṣaheyopādeyajñāne sati hānopādāne yukte /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7457: paramāṇornityatvena kālaviśeṣasatvaṃ nāsti gaganādau tu deśaviśeṣasatvaṃ neti na tatra kṛtiriti bhāvaḥ -- ata eveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7459: tatra sarposti atra rajatamastīti jñāne satītyarthaḥ /.
GSP29vytrkt1u:7461: kulele ghaṭahetutvasya prāgeva sādhanādityataḥ prāguktaṃ dṛṣṭānte sādhyavaikalyoddhāramanūdya nirāha -- yacceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:7466: kapālādeḥ kāraṇatve tvadukta viparītasya laghunaḥ kāryāśrayatvasyaiva tantratvāt / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:7468: tathā cātmanastadabhāvāpanna ghaṭahetutvamiti dṛṣṭantaḥ sādhyavikala eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7475: kiṃ ca saṃyogasya hetutvopagamepi tadavacchadakatvenānyathāsiddhatvādātmano na hetutvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7476: na caivaṃ ceṣṭādvārā ghaṭahetuprayatnavadātmasaṃyogāvacchedakatvenātmanonyathāsiddhau tata eva prayatnasyāhetutvamiti yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:7489: na ca krameṇa sthaladvaye vyabhicāravāraṇāyādṛṣṭādvāraketi pratyakṣeti ca guṇaviśeṣaṇam /

GSP29vytrkt1u:7500: astu ca ghaṭādau kulālakṛtyādereva hetutayā kulālasyāhetutvena taddṛṣṭānteśvarasyā ca kṣityādihetutayā siddhyabhāvaḥ /

GSP29vytrkt1u:7596: vā athavā tadviparyayeṇa śarīrajanyatve 1 janyatvaṃ kartṛjanyatve tu ghaṭatvādikaṃ

GSP29vytrkt1u:7789: udāharaṇasthadhūmapadopasthāpitasya dhūmatvasyodāharaṇavākyopasthāpitena dhūmagatavahnisāmānādhikaraṇyena sahāvacchedakatvarūpasambandhasya saṃsargavidhayā bhānāt / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

GSP29vytrkt1u:9021: prakṛte vipakṣe bādhakābhāvasyeha prāgvyaktatvena hetūnāmaprayojakatvasya vakṣyamāṇadiśā bādhasya ca nirṇayena pakṣetaratvasyāpyupādhitve doṣo netyapi dhyeyam //

GSP29vytrkt1u:9036: - jāyamānā pratyabhijñā proktanasyedānīntanenaikyaṃ gocarayantī tāvatkālasthiratvamavagāhata iti --
GSP29vytrkt1u:9038: iti nyāyena parābhimatāśutaravināśasya vyacirekānnitvatva eva paryavasyatīti maṇyuktadiśā
GSP29vytrkt1u:9039: vā ṭīkoktadiśā 3 pūrvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pūrvatamamapyevamityanādinityataiva siddhyatīti
GSP29vytrkt1u:9049: jñānamevedaṃ netyucyata ityata āha -- pratyabhijñāyā iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9051: soyaṃ devadatta ityādāvivi sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijānāmītyanubhavasiddhatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9059: na caivaṃ pratyabhijñā purovartini gakāre gatvenopasthitagakārābhedaviṣayā,
GSP29vytrkt1u:9064: na ca tathātve tajjātīyoyamityākāraḥ syāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9065: jātyabhedādadhikasya jādigatasya jātitvasya capratītāveva tadākārādiha ca jātitvasyāpratīteriti cenna / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:9069: tathā cābhijñaiva jātā na tu pratyabhijñeti bhāvaḥ -- tatkāleti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9072: tathā sati tajjātiyoyamiti syāditi maṇigranthoktaṃ nirāha -- na ca tathātva iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9074: sa cākāro jātitvabhāna eva yukto nānyatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9076: ṭīkāyāṃ parihāroktāvapi pararītimanusṛtya svayaṃ parihāramāha-- tāratvādineti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:9081: sa evāyaṃ ghaṭa ityāderapi tathātvāpātena vyaktyabhedasya kvāpyasiddhyāpatteśca /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9083: ghaṭāntarādgrṛhītabhedepi ghaṭe sa evāyaṃ ghaṭha iti pratyabhijñāprasaṅgācca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9084: kiñca pratyabhijñājanake sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti vākye sa ityasya jātitve 'yamityasya ca vyaktiparatve jātyā saha vyakterevābhedaḥ pratī 3 yeta na tu jātyā saha jāteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9086: kvāpīti // so 'yaṃ 4 devadatta ityādā 5 vapi jātiviṣayatvasya vaktuṃ śakyatvāditi bhāvaḥ -- ghaṭāntarāditi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:9089: śābdapratyabhijñāyāṃ yā viṣayavyavasthā saiva pratyabhijñāyāmapi bhaviṣyati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9090: tathā ca 6 tatra soyamiti tadidaṃśabdābhyāṃ kiṃ jātivyaktyoruktiratha jātereva uta vktereveti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9092: ādyepi 7 vyakterjātyabhedopi kiṃ sākṣādatha paraṃparāya 8 vā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9094: 1.saṃkarasya-cha-kha-ka-rā. 2.adyāpi-ka. 3.yate- cha-ka. 4.dīpa ityā-a. 5.derapi-i. 6.'kiṃ' ityadhikam-a-i. 7.vyaktijātyorabhe-mu. 8.'vā' iti nāsti - a- i. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

GSP29vytrkt1u:9172: tāragakāre ca gatvatāratve 3 dve api sta iti na jātitvaṃ tāratvasya /

GSP29vytrkt1u:9209: na ca yadā mandre bubhutsā tadā mandragraharūpakāryadarśanena pratibandhaka 1 tvābhāvāttāravyavahāro na syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9213: yadi ca bubhutsottejikā tarhi manmatepyuttejakasya satvena kāryasambhavepi pratibandhakasya satvāttāravyavahāro 2 yuktaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9216: tāraśabdaśravaṇadaśāyāmeva bubhutsāvaśānmandaśabdagraheṇa guṇatvavyāpyajātyā sajātīyaśabdagrahāpratibandhācchṛyaṇāṇe tāraśabde tāraśabdavyavahāro na syādityarthaḥ//

GSP29vytrkt1u:9237: sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9243: sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityādipratyabhijñāy abhrāntitva ityarthaḥ /

GSP29vytrkt1u:9262: anyathaika 3 vaktṛniṣṭhoccāraṇābhivyaktaśabdasya sarvairapi grahaṇaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ -- bhinnendriyeti //

GSP29vytrkt1u:9266: ghṛtādāvapi pratiniyatavyañjakavyaṅgya 5 vāde vakṣyamāṇadiśā ghṛtādigatagandhādirevābhivyañjaka iti 6 bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:9267: anye tvekendriyagrāhyatvaṃ vā ekendriyagrāhyaguṇakatvaṃ vā vyañjakatve tantramityāhuḥ //

GSP29vytrkt1u:10156: na ca samavāyasya siddhau vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ kariṣyati asiddhau 2 kvānaikāntyamiti vācyam /
