GSP29vytrkt1u:10158: anyathā tava 3 nirvikalpakasādhyake 4 viśiṣṭapratyayatvāditi hetau viśiṣṭapadaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt 5 / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10164: sudhoktaṃ eva śaṅkottara āha -- na cetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10169: jātyādiviśiṣṭapratyayo viśeṣaṇajñānajanyaḥ viśiṣṭapratyayatvādityatra viśiṣṭapadasya nirvikalpake vyabhicāravāraṇārthatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10170: tatrāpi virvikalpakasya siddhau vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ kariṣyati,
GSP29vytrkt1u:10173: kāle ghaṭarūpamiti pratītirūpetipadasthāne paṭastantusamaveta iti viśiṣṭajñānarūpeti bodhyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10179: kiñcābhāvavadbhūtalamityabhāviśiṣṭabuddhivat jñāto ghaṭa iṣṭo ghaṭa iti saviṣayakajñānādiviśiṣṭabuddhivacca guṇādiviśiṣṭabuddherapi svarūpasambandhenaivopapatyā aprayojakatvam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10180: anyathā hi jñānecchādveṣakṛtīnāṃ svaviṣayaiḥ saha viśiṣṭasatyabuddhayaḥ, --- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10181: sudhāyāṃ tu anavasthiteriti sūtra 1 masminpakṣe kathaṃ ittham /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10182: yadi vyabhicāraparihārāya samavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaramupeyate tadānavasthiti“riti yojitam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10200: 1.asminpakṣe iti nāsti - i. 2.dabhā-mu. dasvabhā-a. 3.'bhāvaḥ' ityārabhya etatparyantaṃ nāsti -i. 4.abhāvaviśiṣṭabuddhināmaviśiṣṭabuddhisādhāra ityasti-i. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10204: 1 mānena yutasiddhānāṃ 2 jñānādīnāṃ svaviṣayaiḥ saha daṇḍasya puruṣeṇeva sambandhibhinnasambandhaḥ ;
GSP29vytrkt1u:10205: ayutasiddhānāṃ guṇādīnāṃ tu guṇyādibhiḥ sahābhāvasya bhūtaleneva svarūpasambandha iti viparītaṃ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10207: daṇḍīti buddhivaditya 3 numānena guṇādīnāṃ guṇyādibhirjñānādīnāṃ jñeyādibhirabhāvasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:10208: cādhikaraṇena saha daṇḍasya puruṣeṇeva sambandhibhinnasambandhaḥ siddhyet / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10210: abhāvavadbhūtalaṃ ḍitthoyaṃ jñāto ghaṭa ityādiviśiṣṭayathārthacabuddhayo vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10218: yathā vaiparītyaṃ tathā hatau viśeṣamātrānupādānena sarvatraikarūpyamapi syādityevaṃśabdārthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10223: evaṃ ca sambandhibhinnasambandhaviṣayatve viśiṣṭabuddhitvasyaiva tantratayā lāghave 1 naikarūpyaṃ ca bhavati //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10225: yutasiddhatvasāmyeti jñānādīnāṃ svaviṣaye saha svarūpasambandhaḥ caitra 2 daṇḍayostu saṃyogaḥ ;
GSP29vytrkt1u:10228: nāpi guṇakriyājāti viśiṣṭasatyacabuddhayaḥ viśeṣaṇasambandhaviṣayāḥ viśiṣṭabuddhitvāt daṇḍīti buddhivat /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10229: jñāto ghaṭa ityādibuddhirapi svarūpasambandhaviṣayeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10230: na cātrāpi tenaivārthāntaraṃ svarūpāṇāmanantatayā gauraveṇa lāghavādekasyaiva sambandhasya siddheriti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10231: samavāyasvarūsya ca tadgatasambandhatvasya kalpanādapi dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpaneti
GSP29vytrkt1u:10232: nyāyena siddhānāṃ guṇādisvarūpāṇāṃ bhūtalaghaṭābhāvādau kḷptasya sambandhatvarūpadharmamātrasya kalpane lāghavāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10233: ucyata ityādinā maṇukṛtā siddhāntitamanumānāntaraṃ ca nirāha -- nāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10242: anyathā abhāvamātraviśiṣṭasatyabuddhiṃ pakṣīkṛtya sambandhaviṣayatvasādhane lāghavādabhāvamātrānugata eko nityaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sidhyet //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10244: sambandhaviṣayatvasādhane lāghavādabhāve guṇaguṇyādau jñā 2 necchādau caiko nityaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10247: lādhavatarkānugrahasya dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpaneti nyāyasya ca sāmyeti abhāvādau svarūpasaṃbandhaḥ guṇādau tu tadanya iti vyavasthityayogādityarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10248: nanvatra viśiṣṭabuddhitvaṃ vā savikalpakabuddhitvaṃ vā dvayorapi sambandha 3 viṣayabuddhiparyavasānena
GSP29vytrkt1u:10249: sādhyāviśeṣa iti cenna viśeṣaṇadhījanyabuddhitvaṃ vā aviśiṣṭa 4 buddhitvamityupapatteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10250: anyathā tava prayogepyasya doṣaḥ sā 5 mānyāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10251: viśeṣaṇadhījanyatvasyā 6 viśiṣṭo vyāpyavṛttidhījanakatvasya 7 ca buddheḥ sambandha 8 viṣayakatvajñānaṃ vinā durjñānatvaṃ cettavāpyeva doṣaḥ samāna eva /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10252: viśeṣaṇa 9 tābuddhigocarabuddhitvena tadgrahe ca upajīvyatvena tasyaiva hetutvamastvityetadapi samānamiti bhāvaḥ // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10258: nanu tathātve paṭābhāvavati ghaṭavati 1 ghaṭābhāvadhīḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10260: evaṃ ghaṭādeḥ svaviṣa 2 yakajñānādinā nityasambandhavatve ātmatvaṃ syāditi cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10261: tarhi tavāpi sparśavati rūpābhāvavati vāyau rūpadhīḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10265: yadi ca vāyau rūpasamavāyasya satvepi rūpeṇa saha viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣarūpa 3 sambandhābhāvāt rūpāpratītiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10266: tarhi bhūtale ghaṭasatvakāle ghaṭābhāvavaiśiṣṭyasya satvepi ghaṭābhāvena saha viśeṣaṇatā ---- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10268: tatra bādhakasatvāditi bhāvena maṇyuktameva bādhakamāśkate -- nanviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10275: ataḥ samavāyatyāga eva yukta iti bhāvena pratibandyā samādhatte --- tarhi tavāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10288: vāyau tu na kadāpi rūpapratītiriti cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10295: 4 tava tu ghaṭāpanayanakāle sato ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭopanayakālepi satvena tatpratītirdurvārā / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10297: tathātve vāyau rūpasyeva bhūtale ghaṭābhāvadhīḥ kadāpi na syāditi bhāvenāha -- ghaṭāparaṇeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10299: vāyāvivi tatrāpyayogyatālakṣaṇādhikaraṇasvabhāvakalpane ca sā na syāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10303: antye viṣayasatvasya tatra hetutvena tadabhāvādeva tatra raktarūpāpratyakṣatopapatteriti bhāvena pakṣadharādyuktamāṅkya nirāha -- nanvityādinā
GSP29vytrkt1u:10304: mayāpyevaṃ vaktuṃ śakyamityata āha-- tava tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10308: 1.ṣarūpasambandhā ityadhikam -rā. 2.itaḥ ' svābhāvaḥ kalpyaḥ' ityantaṃ nāsti - cha. 3.tadā ityadhikam-mu. 4.tāvat ityasti-cha-rā-mu. tu iti nāsti - ga. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10316: kiñca tvadrītyāśrayaṇepi kimatyantābhāvasya dhīrāpādyate utpādavināśaśīlasya turīyābhāvasya vā / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10321: vivṛtaścāyamartho nyāyāmṛte asato niṣedhapratiyogitvasamarthanavāde iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10323: nanu upaneṣyamāṇaghaṭasaṃyogasya pūrvaṃ sato 'bhāvasya prāgabhāvatvena paścāttadabhāvepi
GSP29vytrkt1u:10324: prāksato ghaṭasyāpayanakāle sato 'bhāvasya ghaṭasaṃyogadhvaṃsarūpatvena tasya ghaṭo
GSP29vytrkt1u:10327: pūrvaṃ ghaṭotrasya evānyatrāpanītaḥ punaratropanīta iti pratītyānyatra nīta iti pratīteriva tatpratītitvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10328: nanvastvevaṃ bhūtalaghaṭo neti dhīstatsaṃyogābhāvaviṣayeti bhavadabhimate doṣābhāvaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:10329: tārkikamate bhaṭṭādimate ca syādeva doṣa ityata āha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10334: nādyaḥ / tasya tvatpakṣe ghaṭākālepi svarūpātmakapratyāsatyā tatra satvena tatpratīterdurvāratvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10337: nanu prācīnarītyāpi iha bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti tatsaṃyogo niṣidhyata ityupanokteḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10344: 1 yaduktaṃ vardhamānena ghaṭāntyantābhāvasya bhūtalena saha tatsaṃyogadhvaṃsādireva sambandha iti na tadā pratītyāpattiriti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10349: tathā ca ghaṭādya 3 tyantābhāvasyāpyākāśādyatyantābhāvasyeva kevalānvayitvāpatte 4 riti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10359: viśeṣaṇe 3 tasya viśeṣyeṇa saṃsarge ca sati viśeṣye viśeṣaṇābhāvasyāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10360: na hi pratiyogini rūpe 4 pratiyogitavācchedaka 5 saṃsarge ca sati rūpasaṃsargābhāvaḥ saṃbhavī //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10361: kiñca rūpasamavāyatopi vāyo rūparāhityasvabhāvavat pratiyogimadadhikaraṇasyāpi pratiyogikāle svasmin tatpratiyogikābhāviśiṣṭapramityajanakatvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyam // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10362: samavāyaikatvena śyāmarūpasamavāyasya ghaṭe satve tadānīmevānyatra vidyamānaraktarūpasamavāyasyāpi satvāditi bhāvenāha -- raktarūpasyāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10372: pratiyogikāla ityādyuktyā na cātra tādṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ kalpyaḥ ghaṭāparasaṇāntaraṃ ghaṭābhāvapratīterityuktadoṣopāsto dhyeyaḥ // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10375: api ca yathā tava catvarīyābhāvagehasvarūpayorna pratiyogikāle sambandhatvaṃ tadābhāvāpratīteḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:10377: tathā ghaṭasatvakāle vaiśiṣṭyasya satvepi na tadā tasya sambandhatvamiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10379: nanu abhāvasya svāśrayeṇa nityasambandhaścet dhvaṃsasyāpi svāśrayanāśena ghaṭonmajjanaṃ syāt / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10380: atyantābhāvasvīkāravādinā tvayā bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭadaśāyāṃ satopyapratīterupapādakatvena pratiyogideśānyadeśatvaṃ vā tatsaṃyogadhvaṃsādīrūpo vā sambandho netyucyate yathā,
GSP29vytrkt1u:10381: tathaivātra nityasambandhapakṣepyastu tathā ca ghaṭāpasaraṇānantaramabhāvadhīrna syāditiśaṅkāśopītyāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10384: catvaraniṣṭho yo 'bhāvaḥ yacca gṛhaṃ tayorye svarūpe tayorgrahe paṭadilakṣaṇapratiyogikāle sambandhatvaṃ nāsti yathā tathā kādācitkapratītyanyathānupapatyā prakṛtepyastītyarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10386: ghaṭadaśāyāmapi ghaṭābhavādhīḥ 1 syāditi maṇyādyuktaṃ bādhakaṃ nisatyedānīṃ bādhakāntarama
GSP29vytrkt1u:10390: evaṃ ca dhvaṃsarūpakāryanāśaḥ svirūpitanityasambandhayuktasvāśrayasya nāśamātreṇa kathaṃ codyate /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10391: na hi viśiṣṭabuddhitvahetunā 3 viśiṣṭabhāvabuddhau siddhyan samavāyo bhavati / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10402: bhāvepi jñāto ghaṭa ityādau svarūpasya sambandhatve rūpe ghaṭa ityādāvapi tathātvāpatteḥ // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10405: tathā ca kathamevamāpādanamityata āha -- kāryanāśaṃ prati hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10415: yutasiddhatvāyutasiddhatvādinā bhāvapadārtheṣu vaiṣamyaṃ cedabhāveṣvapi kāryatvākāryatvādinā vaiṣamyamiti samam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10416: nanu jñānāderghaṭena nityasambandhe sadā ghaṭaprakāśaḥ syāditi cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10417: rūpāderghaṭādinā nityasambandhe sadā ghaṭe śyāmaraktarūpādidhīprasaṅgaḥ syāditi samam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10420: kiṃ ca yathākathañcidbādhakavaśādbhāve dvairūpyaṃ cedabhāvepyuktādeva bādhakādvairūpyamastviti sā 2 mānyameveti bhāvaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10423: kiñca yadi lāghavānnityasambandhikāraṇanāśaḥ kāryanāśe tantraṃ tatopi lāghavānnityasambandhināśa eva tatra tantraṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10430: na tu tadviśeṣaḥ saṃyogatvamiti samavāyasyāpi 1 nāśaḥ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10431: yadi ca samavāyarakṣarthaṃ tatra kāraṇatvādikaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ tarhi vaiśiṣṭyarakṣārthaṃ vaiśiṣṭyanyatvaviśeṣaṇamapyastu / sāmyāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10437: kāryanāśaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇanāśasyaiva prayojakatvādgauravasya cākiñcitkāratvāditi bhāvena kāryanāśaṃ prati hītyādinoktaṃ nirāha -- kiñceti
GSP29vytrkt1u:10442: kāryanāśe samavāyināśasya tantratvamanuktvā nityasambandhināśasyaiva lāghavena prayojakatvasvīkāretiprasaṅgāntaraṃ cāha -- evamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10443: lāghamanusṛtya viśeṣatyāgena sāmānyādera 3 sati kāryanāśe nityasambandhināśavat sambandhanāśe sambandhatvameva tantraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10448: kecittu samavāyikāraṇanāśasya hetutvakalpane samavāyatvaṃ na praviṣṭam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10454: kāryanāśe samavāyanāśo heturityatra kiñca samavāyatvamityādinā yadgauravamuktaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10460: iti nirasyedānīṃ“mathavā 6 sambandhaviśeṣanimittakā iti sādhya“mityādinā maṇyuktamanumānāntaraṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10467: atra ca kṣatyādau kar 1 teva lāghavādviśeṣaṇasambandhopi eka eva sidhyati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10471: sambandhaṃ vināpi viśiṣṭabuddhau gāvāśvādāvapi tatprasaṅgāditi nirastam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10472: hatau ca satyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti maṇyuktyaiva pakṣepi tadanumatamitibhāvena satyapadam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10474: maṇau viśiṣṭabuddhaya ityeva pakṣoktāvapyatra pakṣahetudṛṣṭānteṣu viśiṣṭabuddhipadaṃ laukikapratyakṣaparamiti 3 taṭṭīkokterlaukike 4 tyādyuktiḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10480: tāvatā samavāyasiddhiḥkuta ityata āha -- atra ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10484: sambandhanimittakā ityatra sambandhasya nimittatvaṃ kiṃ viṣayatvenātha samavāyatvena ādye guṇādisvarūpāṇāmeva kena
GSP29vytrkt1u:10487: antye tu samavāyatvaṃ nityasambandhatvaṃ tathā ca lāghavena sambandhatvenaiva hetutvamastu /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10493: tasmādabhāvādāviva guṇādāvapi dharmikalpanāta iti nyāyasāmyena svarūpameva sambandhaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10502: viṣayasya pratyakṣaṃ pratyahetutvasya prāmāṇyavāde vyutpādanācceti jñeyam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10508: tathā ca daṇḍādiviśiṣṭapratītiṃ prati saṃyoga iva guṇādiviśiṣṭapratyakṣapratītirūpamanugatakāryaṃ prati nimittatayā samavāyaḥ sidhyatīti / tanna
GSP29vytrkt1u:10523: tādṛśaviśiṣṭabuddhitvasyopapatte 4 raprayojako heturiti bhāvena tādṛśaviśiṣṭabuddheḥ anyathāsiddhimāha -- tasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10533: abhāvapratiyoginorjñānajñeyādīnāṃ ca vivekaprakāśasya sphaṭatayā nyāyasāmyena tatra
GSP29vytrkt1u:10535: abhāvādhikaraṇayostanmate suvarṇatadupaṣṭambhakapītadravyayośca vivekaprakāśasyāsphaṭatvena nyāyasāmyena tatra samavāyāpatteśca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10537: nanu nitya 2 sambandhasambandhitvamevāyutasiddhi 3 rityato 'yāvadravyabhāviguṇakriyāvayavyādyabhiprāyeṇa viṣayāntaramāha -- bhedādeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10539: yadvādyā viṣayoktirnyoyamatarītyā dvitīyā mīmāṃsakarītyā tṛtīyāsiddhāntarītyeti 4 dhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10541: evaṃ vadatā tyayā sphaṭataravivekaprakāśopetaviśiṣṭabuddhau saṃyoga ityuktaḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10545: sphuṭataravivekaprakāśarāhityasthale samavāya iti vat tādṛśaprakāśavadviśiṣṭabuddhau daṇḍītyādibuddhāviva samayogaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10551: uktaprakāśarāhityarūpasājātyasyānugatasya daṇḍītyādibuddhau satvepi tatra saṃyoganānātvavat samavāyasyāpi nānātvā 1 patterityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10552: yatvāśrayanāśajanyakāryanāśasthale kāryanāśaṃ prati samavāyirūpāśrayanāśa eva heturvācyo na tvāśrayamātranāśaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10553: tathātve kapālaniṣṭhadhaṭadhvaṃsasya kapālanāśenāpi nāśaprasaṅgena ghaṭonmajjanāpatterataḥ samavāyobhyupetya iti tanna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10554: samavāyatvaṃ hi nityasambandhatvaṃ na tu jātiranabhyupagamāt / tathā ca
GSP29vytrkt1u:10555: lāghavātsambandhikāraṇarūpāśrayanāśa eva vā kāraṇībhūtāśrayanāśa eva vāśritakāryanāśaheturiti svīkṛtau dhvaṃsanāśāprasaktyā samavāyasyānupeyatvāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:10556: vastutastu parimāṇavāde dhvaṃsasya bhūtalaidiniṣṭhatvena kapālanāśepi 2 tannāśāprasakteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10562: kiñca kālasya svagatena saṅkhyāparimāṇādinā tvayāpi svarūpasambandhaḥ svīkṛta iti kiṃ tatra samavāyena //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10563: yadi ca kālasya tena saha samavāyasya satvānna svarūpasambandhaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10564: tarhi kā 1 lasya ghaṭena saha saṃyogasya satvāt svarūpasambandho na sidhyet / sāmyāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10566: 2 yadvā prāguktānumāneṣu guṇādiviśiṣṭabuddhinimittasambandhatayā hi samavāyasiddhirabhimatā sā na yuktā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10570: samavāyaśca sambandho nityaḥ syādeka eva saḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10571: iti nityatve sati sambandhatvamiti yatsamavāyalakṣaṇamuktaṃ tatra sambandhatvaṃ tāvadanyathopapatticatuṣṭayena nirāha -- kiñcetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10575: svagatadharmairanyaiścasarvaiḥ svarūpasambandhaḥ svīkṛta iti tenaiva sambandhenaikaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:10576: kālo paricchinnaparimāṇaḥ kāla iti viśiṣṭabuddhyupapattau tatra samavāyasyāvasthityabhāvaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10584: api ca guṇāderapi tvanmate svābhāvasvajñānasvakālaiḥ saha svarūpasambandhatvaṃ tāvadasti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10585: tatra guṇāderabhāvajñānādīnprati svarūpasambandhatvaṃ na pratiyogi 1 viṣayatvādinā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10589: viśeṣaṇatvaṃ ca guṇāderguṇyādāvapi 2 samamiti guṇyādāvapi guṇādeḥ svarūpasambandhatvaṃ kḷptameveti kva samavāyasyāvakāśaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10590: api ca ghaṭarūpasamāvāyā iti samūhālambanajñānāt rūpī ghaṭa ityādibuddhervailakṣaṇyāyāvaśyamaṅgīkāryeṇa
GSP29vytrkt1u:10591: rūpasya ghaṭena saha viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣaṇaiva viśiṣṭabuddhyupapattau kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10593: nanvastvevaṃ tathāpīdānīṃ ghaṭarūpamityādidhībalādghaṭe rūpādinaiva svarūpasambandhaḥ kālasya nānyenetyata āha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10594: 3 yadvā kāle guṇaviśiṣṭabuddhyupapādakasambandhatvena samavāyasiddhāvapyanyatra tathātvena siddhirastvityata āha - api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10607: kiñca samavāyasyāpi svasambandhinā saha sambandhāṅgīkāre anavasthā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10608: tatra svarūpasambandhāṅgīkāre ca guṇādereva guṇyādinā svarūpasambandhīsti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10612: samūhālambanepi ghaṭatadrūpatatsamāvāyānāṃ pratītivadrūpī ghaṭa iti pratītāvapi rūpāditrayasyaiva
GSP29vytrkt1u:10613: bhāne 'nubhavasiddhasya tato vailakṣaṇyasyāyogena rūpādau viśeṣaṇatvādireva samūhālambane
GSP29vytrkt1u:10614: 1 pratītotra pratīyata iti vācyamiti tenaivopapattau kiṃ samavāyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10615: etenābhāvaviśiṣṭabuddhisāmyādrūpī ghaṭa ityādibuddhāvapi samavāyasyāvasthityabhāva ityarthaḥ sūtrāṃśasya sūcitaḥ --
GSP29vytrkt1u:10627: 1.ne 'pra ityasti -i. 2.guṇapadaṃ nāsti -i. 3.'bhāva ityarthaḥ. ityantaṃ nāsti-i -mu. 4.vagatya-i. 5.svarūpeti -mu, rūpeti -i. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10634: dhūmādyanumānena hi dharmimātraṃ dharmamātraṃ vā na 1 sādhyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10643: na ca eka evetyanumānamātraṃ siddhasādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10646: evamanyathopapatyā samavā 4 yasya svarūpameva (sya saṃbandhatvena siddhiṃ)
GSP29vytrkt1u:10649: tathātvenumānaśabdapramāṇamātroccheda iti bhāvena sudhoktaṃ vivṛṇvannāha -- kañceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10654: sa ca eka eveti // rūpī ghaṭa
GSP29vytrkt1u:10656: 1.bo-cha-ka-ga-rā. 2.na tu -ga-mu. 3.viśakalitānāṃ ityadhikaṃ-ca-ka-ga-rā. 4'vā yasya sambandhatve 'numāne' tyādirītyā paṅktirasti-a. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10663: eva sukhasyātmāntare siddhatvātsvasambandha eva kṛtisādhya iti vaktavyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10668: na ca viśiṣṭaṃ nānyatra siddhamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10670: tvanmate padārthāntaratvābhāvādghaṭostītyādivākyabodhyasya ghaṭatatsattayoḥ samavāyasyaikatvenātra tasya jñānatatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10677: 1 ata eva sudhāyāṃ samavāyaikatvanirāsa 2 prakaraṇāvasāne āgamāpahnavaśca samavāyaikye syātpadārthānāṃ tatsaṃsargāṇāṃ 3 sikatāvadviśakalitānāṃ siddhatvādityuktamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10678: samavāyo yadyupeyate tarhyasyaikatvātsiddhasyaiva sādhanamutpādanamiti prāptamityarthāntaraṃ cottarārdhasyopetya samavāyasyaikatve bādhakāntaraṃ cāha -- evamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10681: 1.tataḥ 'iti bhāvaḥ' ityevāsti 'ata eve' tyādi nāsti -i. 2.prapadaṃ nāsti -mu. 3.'sikatāvadviśakalitānāṃ iti nāsti -mu. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10683: evaṃ duḥkhāsyā 1 tmāntare satvena nivartayitumaśakyatvātsvasambandha eva nivartya iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10691: nanvātmādau rūpādisamavāyasya satvepi ghaṭādāviva rūpādinā saha viśeṣaṇatāvaśeṣābhāvādvā --- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10693: 4 siddhasyaiva nityasyaiva duḥkhādisambandhasyāvasānamityapi dhyeyamiti -- evaṃ duḥkhasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10701: yattu maṇau“nanu samavāyasyaikatve kathaṃ rūpinirūpivyavasthe“tyādinaitadena sāṃkaryamāśaṅkyādhikaraṇasvābhāvādinā samāhitaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:10707: adhikaraṇasvabhāvādvā ādheyasvabhāvā 1 dvā na śaṅkara iti cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10708: evaṃ hi taireva sarvavyavasthopapattau kiṃ vyavasthityahetunā samavāyena //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10709: kiñcaiva sarveṣāmapi vastūnāṃ sarvaiḥ saha eka eva sambandha iti vā 2 kasyāpi kenāpi saha na sambandha iti vā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10710: ādye ādhārasya vā ādheyasya vā sambandhasya vā svabhāvāt kutra cidasambandhavyavahāra ita dvitīye ādhārasya vā ādheyasya vā svabhāvātkutracitsambandhavyavahāra iti ca suvacatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10717: nanu saṃyogasyaikye ghaṭasaṃyogo naṣṭaḥ paṭasaṃyoga uptanna iti dhīḥ kathamityata āha -- nāśādīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10721: na hi sambandhanāśepi sambandhinaḥ sthitivat sambandhināśepi sambandhasthitiḥ kṛtracidṛṣṭā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10722: etenātmādiniṣṭhe samavāye rūpādipratisambandhikatvasyābhāvānna saṅkara iti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10725: etenaiva samavāyasya svābhāvataḥ ekatvepi aupādhiko bhedosti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10727: evaṃ hi rūpādiḥ saṃyogātiścaika eva bhedastvaupādhika iti syāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10728: ayamanubhavo bhramostvityato bādhakābhāvāditi bhāvenāha -- na hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10736: saṃyogādiri tyādipadena vibhāgasya vā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvādisambandhasya vā grahaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10739: upādhiśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthājjanyagamyārthe 1 śaiṣikeṭhaki kṛte aupādhikaśabdo 2 niṣpannaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10740: aupādhikamityupādhigamyamutopādhijanyamiti kalpadvayalābhaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā ādyepi jñānaṃ pramā bhramo veti bhāvena krameṇa nirāha -- kiñjaupādhikatvamiti
GSP29vytrkt1u:10753: etena lāghavatarkasahakṛtena dharmigrāhakānumānena samavāyasyaikatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca siddhamitinirastam // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10778: dvyaṇukādīnāṃ sopādānakatvasādhane kāryatvahetunāpi tatsahakṛtena nityamekaṃ upādānaṃ sidhyet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10787: nanvevamīśvarānumānepi lāghavatarkeṇa kartraikyasiddhirna syādityata āha -- īśvareti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10789: samavāyābhāve mānābhāvedeva samavāyasiddhirastvityata āha -- samavāyābhāve tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10794: samavāyābhāve tu ayutasiddha 3 yorādhārādheyabhāvanimittakasambandhaḥ na sambandhabhinnaḥ ayutasiddhayorevānyonyaṃ sambandhatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10796: ayutasiddhau yau bhāvau avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātivyaktī viśeṣanityadravye cetyevaṃ dvandvībhūtau dvaudvau padārthau tayorityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10797: atra sambandha ityasyaiva pakṣatve svarūpasambandhena siddhasādhanaṃ atonyonyamityantam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10801: tena siddhasādhanavāraṇāya vā avayavāvayavinoḥ pratyekamanyena saṃyoge bādhanirāsāya vānyonyamityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10808: ata evāvayavāyavinoḥ pratyekamanyena saha saṃyoge vyibhicāravāraṇāyānyonyamityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10813: abhāvavyāvṛttamanyadena kiñcidayukasiddhatvamiti vādinaṃ prati prayogāntaramāha -- saṃyegeti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10816: saṃyogabhinnaḥ sākṣātsambandhaḥ na saṃyogaviśeṣaṇatobhayabhinnaḥ sākṣātsambandhatvāt saṃyogavat,
GSP29vytrkt1u:10818: sambandha ityevoktau raktaḥ sphaṭikaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vastramityādau sphaṭikavastrasaṃyuktajapākusumakardamasambandharaktimakālimādisambandhe bādhavāraṇāya sākṣādityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10829: tathā ca saṃyogaviśeṣaṇatārūpau dvāveva sakṣātsambandhau sidhyato na tvatiriktaḥ kaścitsamavāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10844: yaccocyate -- samavāyasambandhena pūrvaṃ gatvādi jātiviṣayakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ anantaraṃ jātiviśiṣṭagakāraviṣayakaṃ savikalpakamiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10857: nanu yadyapi nirvikalpake na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10866: 3 yadvā śrotrasannikarṣarūpeṇa samavāyasambandhena jāyamānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayakaṃ vaiśiṣṭyāviṣakaṃ jñānanirvikalpakaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:10879: nāpi jāgarādyaṃ gauriti jñānaṃ janyaviśeṣaṇajñānajanyaṃ janyaviśiṣṭajñānatvāt daṇḍī puruṣa iti jñānavadityanumānam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10881: daṇḍapuruṣayo 1 rubhayoryugapadindriyasannikarṣe asaṃsargāgrahe ca sati vinaiva daṇḍajñānaṃ daṇḍīti jñānotpādānubhavāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10882: tathāpi“etajjanmani prāthamikaṃ gauriti pratyakṣaṃ janyaviśeṣaṇajñānajanyaṃ anyaviśiṣṭajñānatvādanumitivat“iti maṇyuktamanumānaṃ mānam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10888: tathā cakṣuḥ cākṣuṣanirvikalpakasavikalpakātiriktaṃ jñānajanakamityapi tvaduktaprayogābhyāṃ sādhayituṃ śakyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10907: indriyasannikṛṣṭānāṃ nityānāṃ vaidikānāṃ cārthānāṃ smṛtireva syānna tvanubhavaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10913: tadviditi // iha nirvikalpakenāpyupapatyā janmāntarīyasaṃskārodbodhakā 3 dṛṣṭakalpanānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10919: sa ca viśiṣṭajñānarūpa eva savikalpa 5 kaheturastvityāśaṅkyāha -- na ca gotvarūpeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10926: evaṃ ca yadviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ asati bādhake tatsāmānyayorapi sa iti nyāyena
GSP29vytrkt1u:10934: tatra vyabhicārasyaiva bādhakatvādiha ca tadabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10945: na ca vyāptyādidhīre tena vinā neti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10948: tathāpa vahnimānityādijñānaṃ prati vahnyādijñānasya na viśeṣaṇajñānatvenaiva kāraṇatā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10957: nanu sambandhino 1 rajñāne tannirūpitavyāptiśaktyordhīreva netyāśaṅkya nirāha - na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10959: astvevaṃ ko doṣa ityata āha -- tathā ca na nirvikalpaketi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10960: tasya niṣprakārakatvena yadviśeṣanyāyenāpi viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaprakāraṇajñānasyaiva siddhiriti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10961: evamapi nirvikalpakasiddhiriti bhāvena maṇyuktamāśaṅkyate -- nanu tatreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10970: 2 evaṃ hyanumitau karaṇaviśeṣaliṅgajñānasya hetutvādyadviśeṣayoriti nyāyena janyajñānamātre karaṇamātrajñānaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10971: tathā ca pratyakṣepi cakṣurādiviṣayakamatīndriyaṃ nirvikalpaka 3 kalpyaṃ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10972: api caivaṃ pratyakṣaviśiṣṭajñānaṃ prati viśeṣyajñānasyāpi hetunā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10973: saṃśayādau dharmyādi jñānasyānumityadau pakṣādijñānasya hetutvena kḷptatvāt / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:10974: tatra vahnitvaviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyasya parvate bhānādgorityādi 4 tu viśiṣṭajñānamātramityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10978: yadviśeṣayoriti nyāyena viśiṣṭajñānamātraṃ prati viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetutva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10981: tathā idaṃ rajatamityādiviparītaviśiṣṭapratyakṣaviśeṣaṃ prati ca dharmijñānasyādhiṣṭhānajñānasya ca hetutvamasti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10983: tathā anumitau pakṣajñānasya śābde 7 bodhe ca padārthajñānasya ca hetutvamasti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10986: 1.tve viśiṣṭajñānamātraṃ prati viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetu ityadhikam - ca-ka-ga-rā. 2.na ityadhikaṃ-ga. 3.kaṃ ka-ga-rā. 4.dautu-i. 5.satīti-ca-cha-ga-rā.
GSP29vytrkt1u:10989: na ca iṣṭāpattiḥ daṇḍatvaviṣayake nirvikalpake sāmagrīsatvena daṇḍasyāpi svarūpeṇa bhānāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10991: kiṃ ca sāmānyapratyāsattirneti pakṣe vyāptigrahakāle anubhūto vahniḥ parvataṃ prati na viśeṣaṇam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10996: viśeṣaṇajñāna 2 syeva viśeṣaṇajñānatvena daṇḍatvaviśiṣṭasavikalpake daṇḍarūpaviśeṣyajñānasya hetutvaṃ nāniṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:10998: viśeṣaṇajñānasya satvena yathā hetutvaṃ tatheti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:10999: yadviśeṣanyāyenāpi na viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetutvaṃ kalpiyituṃ śakyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11001: sāmānyapratyā 3 sattirastīti nyāyamate 4 yo dhūmavānasau vahnimāniti vyāptigrahadaśāyāṃ parvatīyavahnerapi parvataviśeṣaṇatayā bhānenoktadoṣāsaṃbhāvāt
GSP29vytrkt1u:11007: api ca tvayāpi ghaṭābhāvavadbhūtalamiti jñāne abhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇasya saṃyoktāvimau samavetāvimāvityādijñāne ca saṃyogasamavāyādirūpasya viśeṣaṇasya,
GSP29vytrkt1u:11012: bhūtale abhāva ityabhāvādiviśeṣyakajñānānantarameva bhūtalamabhāvavadityabhāva 3 viśeṣaṇakajñānamiti kalpena tvanyonyāśrayaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11014: etenānugasya viśeṣaṇajñānasyāhetutve anugataṃ viśiṣṭajñānarūpaṃ kāryamākasmikaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11017: yadbalādviśeṣaṇajñānahetutāsiddhyā nirvikalpakasiddhiriti bhāvenānekasthaleṣu vyabhicāramāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11018: yattu maṇāvetadevāśaṅkya prathamaṃ bhūtale ghaṭonāstīti buddhirityādinā samādhānamuktaṃ tadanūdya nirāha -- bhūtalebhāva ityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11021: viśiṣṭajñānaviśeṣaṇajñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve siddhe hi vyabhicārasya gatyantarakalpanaṃ siddhe ca tasya gatyantare tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11027: tadā jñānasāmānyasāmagrīta eva viśiṣṭajñānotpattau sarvamapi jñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ syāditi bhayena viśeṣasāmagrī kalpyeta /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11041: nanu nirvakalpakasyātīndriyatvādeva nānubhava ityata āha -- anyatheti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11047: etenaiva vyabhicāreṇa rūpyādismṛterbhrame viśeṣaṇajñānatvena kāraṇatvaṃ kḷptamatonyatrāpi viśiṣṭajñāne tatkaraṇamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11049: bhramaṃ prati viśeṣyajñānasyāpihetutāyāḥ kḷptatvena anyatrāpi viśiṣṭajñāne tasyāpi hetutvāpatteśca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11050: nanu -- viśeṣañjñānasyājanakatve kathaṃ viśeṣaṇasyaiva prakāratvamiti niyamaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11070: kiṃ ca phalībhūtajñāne yadviśeṣaṇajñāne yadviśeṣaṇatvena bhāsate tadviṣayakajñānena janyaṃ yajjñānaṃ 1 tattatprakārakamiti vā niyamaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:11080: tvaduktarītyā bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāva ityabhāvaviśeṣyakajñānasya prāthamikatveṣyabhāvatvasya tatrājñātatasyaiva prakāratvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11081: bhāvasthala evāyaṃ niyama ityuktāvapīmau saṃyuktau ityādāvabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11082: nanu tarhi gotvāderiva prakāratvaniyamo kiṃ bījamityatastatparamukhenaiva vācayituṃ paroktaṃ viśiṣṭadhīhetudhīviṣayatvarūpaṃ prakāratvaṃ vikalpya nirāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11092: uktena 1 vyabhicāreṇaiva viśiṣṭajñānaṃ sambandhaviṣayakaṃ sambandhajñāne ca sambandhijñānaṃ hetuḥ sambandhi ca viśeṣaṇamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11093: sambandhinoryugapadindriyasannikarṣe tayorasaṃsargāgrahe ca tābhyāṃ sahaivendriyasannikṛṣṭasambandhasyāpi dhīrityuktatvācca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11095: sambandhaḥ sambandhinau vinā na bhāti tau tu tena vināpi bhāta iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11096: kiñca viśeṣyasyāpi sambandhitvena tajjñānasyāpi hetutā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11097: na ca viśeṣyasya sambandhitvepi na 2 pratiyogitvaṃ kiṃ tu viśeṣaṇasyaiveti tajjñānameva heturiti vācyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11100: abhāvavadbhītalamityādau sambandhino 'bhāvāderajñānepi viśiṣṭajñānodayena na tasya hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11106: ayaṃ bhadau vastusvabhāva kṛta iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11107: viśeṣaṇasya pratiyogitvāttannimittaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānasya viśiṣṭajñānahetutvaṃ cettadā doṣamāha -- abhāvādibuddhāviveti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11111: kiñcāstu viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ 1 tathāpi na nirvikalpakasiddhiḥ / tathā hi / na
GSP29vytrkt1u:11114: na ca tatrāpi pūrvānubhavo viśeṣaṇajñānatayā saṃskāradvārā heturiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11116: yajjātīyasya yaṃ 3 janayitveva yajjanātīyajanakatvaṃ sa eva hi tatra 4 vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11121: cakṣurādīndriyajātīyasya sannikarṣaṃ janayatvaiva cākṣuṣādisākṣātkārajātīyajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti sannikarṣa evendriyasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11122: tathā daṇḍajātīyasya cakrabhramaṃ janayitvaiva ghaṭajātīyajanakatvamiti bhramiḥ daṇḍasya vyāpāro dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11126: nanvastvevaṃ vyāpāratvaṃ tādṛśamapi saṃskārasyāstvityata āha -- na cātreti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11128: nanu viśiṣṭajñānasyoktavidhayā kāryatāvacchedakatvepi nirvikalpakāsiddhiḥ kuta ityata āha -- tathāceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11134: nanu smaraṇasya viśeṣaṇajñāna 1 janyatvādanavasthetyata āha -- janyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11137: smṛtivyāvṛttameva kāryatāvacchedakaṃ svayamupapādya smṛtisādhāraṇameva kāryatāvaccedakamastviti matāntaramāha -- keci 3 diti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11145: prathamapravṛttena pramāṇena lāghavasahakāriṇā janyajñānaparamparāyāmeva viśeṣaṇajñānasya kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11147: na ca janyasya sarvasyāpi jñānasya viśeṣaṇajñānyatve pūrvapūrvajñānadhārāyā avicchede prāyaṇādyanupapatyā jñānānavasthādoṣaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11150: tatrāpi 3 pūrvajanmāntararīyānubhava iti svīkāre 4 ṇāviralalagrajñānadhārāyā abhāvena prāyaṇādyupapatteḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11151: na ca puruṣa 5 prayojyaśabdavṛttijātiviśiṣṭapratyakṣe viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ na smṛtirūpaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:11174: kiñcātīndriya 2 jñānopagame yogyānupalabdherabhāvena jñānābhāvasya niścetumaśakyatayā anupalabdhiliṅgajanyā ghaṭādyabhāvadhīrna
GSP29vytrkt1u:11176: nirvikalpeke sādhakābhāvamātraṃ na bādhakaṃ cāstītyāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11182: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva nirvikalpakābhāve liṅgam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11183: nirvikalpake sati savikalpakāvaśyaṃbhāvābhāvena nirvikalpakaṃ prati savikalpakasyā vyāpakatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11184: api ca nirvikalpakajanyasavikalpakotpattidaśāyā 1 matī 2 ndriyanirvakalpakasāmagrīsatvena satpratipakṣavatsāmagrīdvayasya parasparapratibandhakamapi jñānaṃ notpadyata // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11186: parāmarśena gṛhyamāṇo ghaṭādyabhāvotra ghaṭo nāsti yogyatve satyanupalabhyamānatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt1u:11189: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva ghaṭādyabhāvabuddhau liṅgamastu savikalpakasya yogyatayā tadabhāvajñānasaṃbhavāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11193: savikalpakasya nirvikalpavyāpakatayā savikalpakābhāvasyaiva tatra liṅgatvāttacasya ca prataykṣādityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11197: savikalpakadaśāyāṃ nirvikalpakasāmagryeva nāsti nirvikalpakābhāvasahakṛtendriyasaṃyogādereva nirvikalpakasāmagrītvādevaṃ ca noktadoṣa iti bhāvenāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca pūrveti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11198: 1.itaḥ ' na ca pūrva' ityantaṃ nāsti. atra 'mapi indriya sannikarṣarūpa' ityasti -cha-ga. 2.mapīndriyasannikarṣarūpanirvi -ka-mu-rā. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11203: na ca samūhālambana 1 vat sāmagryā 2 dārthasamājādekaṃ jñānamastīti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11205: na hi saṃbhavatyevameva jñānamekasminneva ghaṭe ghaṭatvaprakārakaṃ tada 3 prakārakaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11206: api ca daṇḍapuru 4 ṣobhayasannikarṣe sati daṇḍadaṇḍatvobhayanirvikalpakānantaraṃ daṇḍe daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyajñānātpūrvaṃ muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭa 5 puruṣadhīḥ syāt / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11208: tattandriyasannikarṣarūpānekasāmagrīsatvepi anekagocaramekaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate na tu pratibandha evamastvityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11210: nanu smṛtisāmagrītonubhavasāmagryā ivānumitisāmagrītaḥ pratyakṣasamāmagryā iva ca nirvikalpakasyaivotpattirityastvityato doṣāntaramāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11218: na hi daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣānantaraṃ daṇḍe daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyajñānātpūrvaṃ muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭapuruṣajñānamanubhūyate /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11223: kiñca daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣe 1 tadubhayasvarūpamātraviṣayakanirvikalpakavat sambandhasyāpi sannikarṣe 2 tatsvarūpamātraviṣayakaṃ nirvikalpakamapi kasmānna syāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11227: muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭajñānotpattivelāyāṃ daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyamapi daṇḍe bhātyevetitvanmata 4 vannyāyamate 5 viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyadhīrastvityata āha -- kiñca daṇḍapuruṣeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11238: api cāsya nirvikalpakajatīyasya jñānakāryaṃ vyāvahāraṃ saṃskāraṃ icchādikaṃ ca kadāpyajanayato na jñānatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11239: natarāṃ cāsya svaṣaye kadāpi saṃśayādyavirodhino niścayatvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11241: na ca nirvikalpakena kasyacidapi vastutaḥ kadāpi siddhirdṛṣṭā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11243: api caivaṃ nirvikalpakajñānaṃ pratyakṣaviśeṣavat anumitiviśeṣopi syāt / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11245: kvacitkāryājananepi nirvikalpakāntare jñānakāryabalāt nirvikalpakamātre jñānatvādikamaviruddhamityato 'syetyasya vivaraṇaṃ nirvikalpakajātīyasyeti
GSP29vytrkt1u:11248: nanvīśvarajñānamiva nirvikalpakamapi pramābhramavijātīyajñānamanitya 2 mityata āha -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11249: tathātve ghaṭādirapi kuto na jñānaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11250: yadapi“pratyakṣaṃ dvividhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ savikalpakaṃ ce“ti maṇyādau pratyakṣa 3 tvakathanaṃ tadapyayuktamityāha -- api caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11254: nirvikalpakābhāve tu jñānatvāśrayo na savikalpakatvāvacchinnibhinnaḥ jñānatvāt daṇḍīti jñānavat,
GSP29vytrkt1u:11258: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ paddhatau“dravyādivikalpānāṃ prathamamevotpattau bādhakābhāvena 4 nirvikalpakā 5 nupapatteḥ“iti / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt1u:11259: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ ca nirvikalpakamiti bhāvenāha -- nirvikalpakābhāve tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11270: pūrvamabhāne viśiṣṭajñāne prakāratvānupapattirūpasya sambandhijñānaṃ vinā sambandhajñānānupapatyādirūpasya
